      <div class="content-border pager-offset"><h2 class = "black-bar-header">Notícias Mais Recentes</h2><div class="view view-news-recent view-id-news_recent view-display-id-teaser view-dom-id-92b843f85992c044937fa0c2450e2c9a">
        
  
  
      
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76755">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/assista-ao-vivo" title="Assista ao vivo!" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35275" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/ddnexus2_br_6.jpg?itok=XoYI3Eqm" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/assista-ao-vivo">Assista ao vivo!</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Tixinha recebe Takeshi, Revolta, brTT e YoDa para comentarem os melhores momentos das semifinais da Primeira Etapa 2017!</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76755">4 min ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76749">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/tres-lados-contra-parede" title="Três lados contra a parede" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35827" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/3lados-header-legacy.jpg?itok=b3eRXw8E" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/tres-lados-contra-parede">Três lados contra a parede</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Cada jogador das semifinais tem um propósito e um desafio individual. Uns lutam por reconhecimento, outros pela fama, alguns para se provar para todos, e há quem só queira se sentir parte de algo maior. Esta matéria é o ponto de vista de Takeshi, Ziriguidun e micaO.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76749">1 hour ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76703">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/contra-tudo-e-contra-todos-matilha-e-o-youivo" title="Contra tudo e contra todos - a Matilha e o YoUivo" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35804" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/semi2-header-legacy.jpg?itok=mKO5Bi-U" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/contra-tudo-e-contra-todos-matilha-e-o-youivo">Contra tudo e contra todos - a Matilha e o YoUivo</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">A Red surpreendeu a todos com a escalação do Yoda - mais ainda quando ela se manteve para todos os jogos da série. No entanto, a aposta se pagou. O desempenho do Meio foi essencial para que o uivo trancado no peito ecoasse: a Red está em Recife!</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76703">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76690">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte" title="Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35783" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/capa2.jpg?itok=5FGXLlWl" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte">Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Keyd supera todas as dúvidas plantadas ao longo da Fase Regular, anula o favoritismo Intrépido e carimba as passagens para Recife.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76690">2 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76660">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/analise-das-semis-por-melao" title="Análise das Semis, por Melão" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35754" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/33360696576_0e83f7dc27_o.jpg?itok=IB28J4eK" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/analise-das-semis-por-melao">Análise das Semis, por Melão</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Nosso gigante analista dá o caminho das pedras dos dois jogões que iniciam a Fase Eliminatória do CBLoL 2017  Primeira Etapa.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76660">3 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>

  <div class="pane-content">

<div class="panel-pane pane-views-panes pane-frontpage-rotator-current-new" >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    


  <div id="content-promo">
    <!-- data-cycle-fx="promoContentSlides" -->
    <div class="content-promo-rotator cycle-slideshow"
      data-cycle-fx="promoFade"
      data-cycle-timeout="10000"
      data-cycle-slides=".content-promo-slide"
      data-cycle-pause-on-hover=".promo-content"
      data-cycle-pager=".content-promo-pager"
      data-cycle-auto-height="1920:1080"
      data-cycle-easing="easeInOutSine"
      data-cycle-speed="1500"
      data-cycle-pager-template="<span></span>"
      >
      <div class="content-promo-slide" id="promo-node-76184">
    <div class="promo-background"  style="background-image:url(/sites/default/files/upload/backgrounds/webrotator_galio_coverframe1.jpg);">

</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/analise-das-semis-por-melao">Análise das Semis, por Melão</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Nosso gigante analista dá o caminho das pedras dos dois jogões que iniciam a Fase Eliminatória do CBLoL 2017  Primeira Etapa.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76660">3 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>

      <header id="section-header" class="section section-header">

        <div class="block block-system block-menu block-main-menu block-system-main-menu odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main-menu">

    <div class="content clearfix">
      <button class="mobile-menu-toggle collapsed"><div class="burger"></div></button><ul class="menu"><li class="first leaf"><a href="/riot-manifesto">About</a></li>

      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-preface-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-preface-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-preface" class="zone zone-preface clearfix container-12">
    <div class="grid-4 region region-preface-first" id="region-preface-first">
  <div class="region-inner region-preface-first-inner">
    <div class="block block-panels-mini block-career-header block-panels-mini-career-header odd block-without-title" id="block-panels-mini-career-header">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="panel-display panel-1col clearfix" id="mini-panel-career_header">
  <div class="panel-panel panel-col">
    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-node careers-landing-header" >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="ds-1col exp-layout-text-related node node-explore-banner view-mode-full clearfix ">
    <div class="field-group-format group_scroll_group field-group-div group-scroll-group scroll-pane-explore speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field-group-format group_explore_meta field-group-div group-explore-meta  speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>Rioters Wanted</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We&rsquo;re looking for humble but ambitious, razor-sharp professionals who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. These individuals will become part of entrepreneurial teams who prefer action (kicking ass) over process and bureaucracy (taking names). We embrace those who see things differently, who <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A43u58HQ-A8&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">aren&#39;t afraid to experiment</a>, and who have a healthy disregard for the rules.</p>
<p>Applicants should first learn about Riot and play <em>League of Legends </em>because we&#39;re looking for people who, like us, take play seriously and for whom it&#39;s never &quot;just a game.&quot; We play lots of games, especially our own, because hands-on gaming experience is our ultimate guiding compass.</p>
<p>We&#39;re hiring for multiple levels, from associate to lead, so don&#39;t get hung up on the title; it&#39;s all about the team. For the roles below that are listed by team name, we&#39;re hiring for varying levels of XP.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-explore-related-articles field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">
 <div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-featured_teaser clearfix ">

  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Contact</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="view view-faq view-id-faq view-display-id-page faq-page view-dom-id-1addf66c489e1b26d502f2fcbe63c638">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">      <h3>Company</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Interested in working at Riot Games? " rel="faq-a-72" class="faq-question">Interested in working at Riot Games? </a>
<div id="faq-a-72" class="faq-answer"> <p>Visit our&nbsp;<a href="careers" target="_blank">Careers</a>&nbsp;section, which&nbsp;includes information about what it&#39;s like to be a Rioter, how to apply for roles and what sorts of opportunities are available. If you&#39;re looking for career advice,&nbsp;try hitting up our <a href="http://www.linkedin.com/groups/Inside-Riot-Games-People-Game-3544410?gid=3544410">LinkedIn group</a>. LinkedIn is a site for professionally focused discussion and some seekers have received good advice when they ask for help there. Please do try some internet searches first, though. There&#39;s lots of great advice already published online about how to break into the games industry, and there are a number of online resources that will put you on the right path. We hire self-starters, so that means doing some good ol&#39; fashioned Googling before you hit us up with questions.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Looking for a tour of the Riot offices? " rel="faq-a-496" class="faq-question">Looking for a tour of the Riot offices? </a>
<div id="faq-a-496" class="faq-answer"> <p>We now offer sneak peeks into our Los Angeles, California headquarters. To learn more, click <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/tours" target="_blank">here</a>.</p>
<p>Can&#39;t make it down to LA, but still want a look? Check out this behind-the-scenes look of our&nbsp;<a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150420/1663/twas-night-our-move-la" target="_blank">new office</a>!</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Press</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="In need of press materials? Have a media request? " rel="faq-a-73" class="faq-question">In need of press materials? Have a media request? </a>
<div id="faq-a-73" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;re with the <strong>media or press </strong>and want to talk, shoot a note to&nbsp;<a href="mailto:media@riotgames.com">the folks in Riot Communications</a>.&nbsp;(If you&#39;re not media or press and you send a note there, we&#39;ll&nbsp;<a href="http://youtu.be/gAYL5H46QnQ" target="_blank">throw it on the ground</a>. Media only, man.)&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>League of Legends</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Can I use your IP?" rel="faq-a-2357" class="faq-question">Can I use your IP?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2357" class="faq-answer"> <p>Want to create an app, website, t-shirt or something else with our intellectual property, but don&rsquo;t know what&rsquo;s legally kosher? &nbsp;Check out our <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber">Legal Jibber Jabber</a>. If you&rsquo;re trying to get feedback on an app or website, register it at our <a href="https://developer.riotgames.com/">Developer Portal</a>.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Got an awesome idea for League of Legends? " rel="faq-a-495" class="faq-question">Got an awesome idea for League of Legends? </a>
<div id="faq-a-495" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;ve got an awesome idea for a skin, champion or how to improve <em>League of Legends</em>, the best place for these is <a href="http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/" target="_blank">http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/</a>.&nbsp;We do read the forums and pay attention to the ideas that players share with us there.&nbsp;</p>
<p>For a bunch of reasons, we can&#39;t accept submissions for skin or champion concepts, but we&#39;ve noticed that many summoners love coming up with concepts so we created <a href="http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts" target="_blank"><span class="s1">this forum</span></a> where you can post and share these ideas. If you post here, you&#39;ll get others&#39; feedback on your concept.</p>
<p>Please note that this forum&#39;s purpose isn&#39;t to help Riot find the newest champion of the League. Rather, we want to give you a platform to express your creativity.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Looking to start a tournament?" rel="faq-a-2358" class="faq-question">Looking to start a tournament?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2358" class="faq-answer"> If you&#39;re setting up a tournament and looking for support, check out our <a href="http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/community/prized-events" target="_blank">Prized Events page</a> where you&rsquo;ll be able to submit an application. If you can&rsquo;t find your answer there, hit up <a href="mailto:tournaments@riotgames.com">tournaments@riotgames.com</a>.
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Need help putting League of Legends videos on the YouTubes?" rel="faq-a-493" class="faq-question">Need help putting League of Legends videos on the YouTubes?</a>
<div id="faq-a-493" class="faq-answer"> <p>If you&#39;d like to put your&nbsp;<em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;fan videos on YouTube or another streaming video distributor, but need to cut through the proverbial red tape, check out the official policy on advertising in your&nbsp;<em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;videos&nbsp;<a href="/legal-jibber-jabber" target="_blank">here</a>.&nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Player Support &amp; Billing</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Have a billing issue or experiencing a problem with League of Legends?" rel="faq-a-75" class="faq-question">Have a billing issue or experiencing a problem with League of Legends?</a>
<div id="faq-a-75" class="faq-answer"> <p>Please submit a ticket at <a href="http://support.leagueoflegends.com" target="_blank">support.leagueoflegends.com</a>. This is the <strong>fastest</strong> way to get your issue resolved. We apologize for your difficulties and want to make things right. Taking your <em>League of Legends</em> support issues directly to the <em>League of Legends</em> support team is the best way to get speedy resolution.&nbsp;Support questions or tickets submitted to <em>League of Legends</em> or Riot Games email addresses will end up being re-directed back to the <a href="http://support.leagueoflegends.com" target="_blank"><em>League of Legends</em> support site.</a></p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Misc</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Need some new threads or a fluffy friend?" rel="faq-a-2359" class="faq-question">Need some new threads or a fluffy friend?</a>
<div id="faq-a-2359" class="faq-answer"> <p>You&rsquo;re in luck! We recently launched our <a href="https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/" target="_blank">official merch site</a> with collectibles and clothing we hope you&rsquo;ll love.</p>
 </div>  </li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last faq-group">  
          <a href="#" title="Question about privacy, your personal information, or data? " rel="faq-a-2356" class="faq-question">Question about privacy, your personal information, or data? </a>
<div id="faq-a-2356" class="faq-answer"> <p>We&#39;ve got an address just for that - <a href="mailto:privacy@riotgames.com">privacy@riotgames.com</a> is the place to go.</p>
 </div>  </li>
        <!-- <li class="ftr-link"></li> -->
  </ul></div>    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>    </div>
  </div>

    (function() {
  var Tracker = {};

  Tracker.track = function(eventName, data) {
    var url = "https://support.riotgames.com/hc/tracking/events?locale=en-us";

    var payload = {
      "event": eventName,
      "data": data,
      "referrer": document.referrer
    };

    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

    xhr.open("POST", url, true);
    xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json; charset=UTF-8");
    xhr.send(JSON.stringify(payload));
  };

})();

    <a href="http://blogs.odia.ig.com.br/justicaecidadania/2017/03/27/secretaria-nao-responde-a-ataque-do-tj-contra-atraso-no-pagamento-de-salarios/" title="Secretaria evita atacar o TJ contra atraso de salários dos magistrados">
        <small class="chapeu">crise no estado</small>
        <h2 class="chamada">Secretaria evita atacar o TJ contra atraso de salários dos magistrados</h2>
        <p class="descricao">Presidente do Tribunal de Justiça do Rio, desembargador Milton Fernandes de Souza, avisou: 'Vamos adotar medidas cabíveis'</p>
    </a>
</div><div class="ODICHE00803 grid-3 entre-componentes nomgr" id="67211363-F6FD-4CA5-9FD1-8DF99C8D4A35">
    <a href="http://odia.ig.com.br/esporte/2017-03-27/de-saida-manchester-prepara-proposta-milionaria-e-pode-tirar-neymar-do-barca.html" title="Proposta do Manchester pode tirar Neymar do Barça">
        <small class="chapeu">De saída? </small>
        <h2 class="chamada">Proposta do Manchester pode tirar Neymar do Barça</h2>
        <div class="bloco">
            <figure>
                <img src="http://ejesa.statig.com.br/bancodeimagens/7h/nh/k1/7hnhk114cmlulv7t8iibzfvsy.jpg" alt="Proposta do Manchester pode tirar Neymar do Barça" />
            </figure>
            <p>Clube estaria disposto a pagar a multa rescisória do atacante brasileiro</p>
        </div>
    </a>
</div><div class="ODICHE00803 grid-3 entre-componentes nomgr" id="13FA8800-C254-4030-A1D2-E3C1A07663F7">
    <a href="http://odia.ig.com.br/esporte/carioca/2017-03-27/internautas-nao-perdoam-erros-de-arbitragem-no-classico-flamengo-x-vasco.html" title="Flamengo x Vasco inspira memes nas redes sociais">
        <small class="chapeu">depois do clássico</small>
        <h2 class="chamada">Flamengo x Vasco inspira memes nas redes sociais</h2>
        <div class="bloco">
            <figure>
                <img src="http://ejesa.statig.com.br/bancodeimagens/8d/8o/0h/8d8o0hnobn3tz2ft5i5dtb3gm.jpg" alt="Flamengo x Vasco inspira memes nas redes sociais" />
            </figure>
            <p>Pênalti polêmico e empate são motivo de piada entre internautas</p>
        </div>
    </a>
</div><div class="ODILIA00406 grid-6 entre-componentes nomgr" id="1F09278E-F169-40CE-8B27-3FF9F0261352">
	<section>          
	    <div class="ODICHE00903 grid-2">
	        <a href="http://odia.ig.com.br/rio-de-janeiro/2017-03-27/bombeiros-encontram-corpo-de-triatleta-que-sumiu-durante-competicao.html" title="Corpo de triatleta é encontrado na praia do Recreio">
	        	<figure>
		            <img src="http://ejesa.statig.com.br/bancodeimagens/98/qf/3k/98qf3ksscocpnt152dc6tq30a.jpg" alt="Corpo de triatleta é encontrado na praia do Recreio" />
		        </figure>
	            <small class="chapeu">morreu no mar</small>
	            <h2 class="chamada">Corpo de triatleta é encontrado na praia do Recreio</h2>
	        </a>
	    </div><div class="ODICHE00903 grid-2">

    <div class="listagem__ultimas" id="app_feed" ng-controller="FeedsController">
        <div class="ODICHE01103 grid-3" ng-repeat="feed in feeds" ng-class="{noright:!(($index + 1) % 4), noleft:!($index % 4), 'com-foto' : (feed.urlImgEmp_316x198)}">
            <a href="{{feed.url}}" title="{{feed.titulo}}" ng-click="AddPoint($index)">
                <figure ng-if="feed.urlImgEmp_316x198">
                    <img class="photo" src="{{feed.urlImgEmp_316x198}}" />
                </figure>
                <small class="chapeu" ng-bind="formatDate('{{feed.startDate}}') + ' - ' + mioloPao('{{feed.secaoBreadcrumb}}')"></small>
                <h2 class="chamada" ng-if="feed.urlImgEmp_316x198">{{feed.titulo | limitTo: 45}}{{feed.titulo.length &gt; 45 ? '...' : ''}}</h2>

                <p ng-if="!feed.urlImgEmp_316x198">{{feed.olho | limitTo: 115}}{{feed.olho.length &gt; 115 ? '...' : ''}}</p>
            </a>
            <div class="quickly-share">
                <ul>
                    <li class="facebook" data-url="{{feed.url}}">
                        <a href="javascript:void(0)"></a>
                    </li>
                    <li class="twitter" data-url="{{feed.url}}" data-title="{{feed.titulo}}">

                    </li>

<script>

    function shareWindow(wprop,hprop,vurl){
        var _h, _g;
        _h = (window.innerWidth / 2) - (wprop / 2);
        _g = (window.innerHeight / 2) - (hprop / 2);
        window.open(vurl, "", "toolbar=no, location=no, directories=no, status=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=no, resizable=no, copyhistory=no, width=" + wprop + ", height=" + hprop + ", top=" + _g + ", left=" + _h);
    }

    $(document).ready(function() {

        $(document).on('click', '.quickly-share .facebook', function() {
            var _mywidth = 626, _myheight = 436, _url = '';
            _url = 'https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=';
            _url += encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-url'));
            
            shareWindow(_mywidth,_myheight,_url);
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.quickly-share .twitter', function() {
            var _mywidth = 685, _myheight = 500, _url = '', _title = $(this).attr('data-title');
            
            _url = 'http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=' + _title + '&url=';
            _url += encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-url'));
            
            shareWindow(_mywidth,_myheight,_url);
        });
        
    });

</script></div><div class="EJEHTML00112" id="293FC1EE-4415-408A-852E-8BDB0E945297">

<script>
    var empilhamentoMaislidas = (function() {

    	var json;

    	var maisLidas = function (periodo, limite) {

			switch(periodo) {
				case 'today':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
				break;
				case 'weekend':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-weekend.json';
				break;
				case 'week':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-week.json';
				break;
				case 'month':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-month.json';
				break;
				default:
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
			}

			$('.ODILA00103 ul').html('<li style="border-bottom:0;"><img src="http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/img/odia20/ring.gif" width="30" height="30"></li>');

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {

				var html = '';
				var i = 1;
                
	            $.each(data.registros, function(key, val) {

	            	if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {
	            		html += '<li class="titulo entre-componentes"><a href="' + val.url + '" title="' + val.title + '">' + val.title + '</a></li>';
	                }
	                i++;

	            });

	            $('.ODILA00103 ul').html(html);

	        });

    	}

    	return {
            maisLidas: maisLidas
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	empilhamentoMaislidas.maisLidas('today', 5);

    });
</script></div></div><div id="34D3C408-B07F-408A-9080-95A3117C4C73" class="faixa-3"><div class="EJEHTML00112" id="E171FEB8-5DFD-477C-A79D-8369F1C90EB8">
	<div><div style="margin-top:50px;" class="fb-page grid-3" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/odiajornal/" data-tabs="timeline" data-width="301" data-height="600" data-small-header="true" data-adapt-container-width="true" data-hide-cover="false" data-show-facepile="true"><blockquote cite="https://www.facebook.com/odiajornal/" class="fb-xfbml-parse-ignore"><a href="https://www.facebook.com/odiajornal/">Jornal O Dia</a></blockquote></div></div>

		</form>

		<div class="progress "></div>

	<div id="bx-pager">
		<a data-slide-index="0" href="">Veículos</a>
		<a data-slide-index="1" href="">Imóveis</a>
		<a data-slide-index="2" href="">Empregos</a>
		<a data-slide-index="3" href="">Serviços e Produtos</a>

<script>
    var destaquesClassificados = (function() {

    	var vitrine = function (limite) {

			var json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/odia/classificados/highlights.json';

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {
				
				var html = '';
                
	            $.each(data, function(key, val) {

	            	var i = 1;

	            	html += '<li>';
					html += '	<ul>';

	            	$.each(val, function(key2, val2) {

	            		var title 		= val2.title;
	            		var description = val2.description;
	            		var city 		= val2.city;
	            		var estate 		= val2.estate;
	            		var price 		= val2.price;
	            		var thumb 		= val2.thumb;
	            		var url 		= val2.url;
	            		var logo		= val2.client.logo;
	            		var url_cliente = val2.client.url;

	            		if(city == null || city == ''){
	            			city = '';
	            		}else{
	            			city = city +' - ';
	            		}

	            		if(price == null || price == '' || price == '0,00'){
	            			price = '';
	            		}else{
	            			price = 'R$ '+ price;
	            		}

	            		if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {

		            		html += '	<li>';
							html += '		<a href="'+ url +'" target="_classificados">';
							html += '			<img src="'+ thumb +'" width="158" height="100" />';
							html += '			<h3>'+ title.substr(0, 12) +'</h3>';
							html += '			<p>'+ description.substr(0, 50); +'</p>';
							html += '			<h4>'+ city + estate +'</h4>';
							if(val != 'jobs'){
								html += '			<h5>'+ price +'</h5>';
							}
							html += '		</a>';

							if(logo !== null && logo !== '') {
								html += '<div class="logo-client">';
									if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '<a href="'+url_cliente+'" target="_blank">';
									}
		            				html += '<img src="'+ logo +'" width="110" height="50" />';
		            				if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '</a>';
									}
		            			html += '</div>';
		            		}

							html += '	</li>';

						}

						i++;

	            	});

	            	html += '	</ul>';
					html += '</li>';

	            });

	            $('ul.classificado-odia').html(html);

	        });

			vitrineCarrossel();

    	}

    	var vitrineCarrossel = function () {
    		setTimeout(function(){
				$( document ).ready(function() {
					slider = $(".classificado-odia").bxSlider({
						pagerCustom: '#bx-pager',
						auto: true,
						autoControls: false,
						pause: 5000,
						speed:500,
						infiniteLoop:true,
						autoHover: true,
						onSliderLoad: function (currentIndex) {
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideBefore: function(){			
							$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideAfter: function(){
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},		
						controls: false
					});
					$( ".classificado-odia" ).mouseenter(function() {
						$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
					}).mouseleave(function() {
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
					});
					$( "#bx-pager a" ).click(function(){		
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						setTimeout(function(){
						  slider.startAuto();
						}, 200);
					});
				});
				}, 1000);
    	}

    	var vitrineBusca = function () {
    		var form = document.getElementById('form-classificados-busca');
			form.submit();
			return false;
    	}

    	return {
            vitrine: vitrine,
            vitrineCarrossel: vitrineCarrossel,
            vitrineBusca: vitrineBusca
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	destaquesClassificados.vitrine(6);

    });
</script></div></div></div></section><footer class="footer-odia"><div class="footer-topo"><div class="faixa-12"><div class="grid-6 indices"><h5>Editorial</h5><nav><ul><!-- <li><a 	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {
		var wfscr = document.createElement('script');
		wfscr.type = 'text/javascript';
		wfscr.async = true;
		wfscr.src = url + '&r=' + Math.random();
		(document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]||document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(wfscr);
		for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}

            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://mx.activo.news';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="http://mx.activo.news/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>

      <script>

// Define a posicao inicial do mouse
var mouse_position_switch = false;

// Evento que vai detectar o movimento do mouse
jQuery(document.body).on('mouseleave', function(e) {
    // Evento que dispara quando o mouse for ao topo
    if(mouse_position_switch && retornaCookie('modalcadastrado') == null && retornaCookie('modalexibida') == null ){
      jQuery('#modal-abandono').modal('show');
      // Seta o cookie que a modal foi exibida e assim nao exibira mais // qtd em dias
      setaCookie('modalexibida', '365');
    }
  });

// Funcoes de manipulacao de cookies
function setaCookie(key, value, url) {
  var expires = new Date();
  expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (value * 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
  document.cookie = key + '=' + value +';path=/'+ ';expires=' + expires.toUTCString();
}

function retornaCookie(key) {
  var keyValue = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + key + '=([^;]*)(;|$)');
  return keyValue ? keyValue[2] : null;
}

// Evento que seta o valor booleano para o mouse e mostra entao a modal do abandono
jQuery(document.body).on('mousemove', function(e) {
  if(e.clientY < 100){
    mouse_position_switch = true;
  } else {
    mouse_position_switch = false;
  }
});

jQuery("#enviar-popup").on('click', function() {
  jQuery("#cadastro-popup").submit()
});

// Eventos do formulario
jQuery('#cadastro-popup').validate({
  rules: {
    nome: { required: true, minlength: 2 },
    email: { required: true, email: true },
  },
  showErrors: function() {
    if (this.settings.highlight) {
      for (var i = 0; this.errorList[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.highlight.call(this, this.errorList[i].element,
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
    if (this.settings.unhighlight) {
      for (var i = 0, elements = this.validElements(); elements[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.unhighlight.call(this, elements[i],
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
  },                     
  submitHandler: function( form ){

    var cidadecad = 'México';
    var cidadegeo = localStorage.getItem("cidade");
    if(cidadecad==""){
      var cidgrava = cidadegeo;
    }else{
      var cidgrava = cidadecad;
    }
    jQuery.ajax({
      type: "POST",
      url: "http://mx.activo.news//wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=salvanewsletter",
      data: {
        idorigem: '81',
        nome: jQuery('#nome-popup').val(),
        email: jQuery('#email-popup').val(),
        cidade: cidgrava,
        etapa: 'Abandono'
      },
      success: function(data, textStatus, xhr) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#enviado-popup').fadeIn('fast');
          setaCookie('modalcadastrado', '365'); //define cookie para que o cadastro seja lido posteriormente a fim de nao exibir a modal / 365 dias
        });
      },
      error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#falha-popup').fadeIn('fast');
        });
      }
    });
    return false;
  }
});




</script>
		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='http://mx.activo.news/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
		</script>

</html>

<script>
	function appendGallery() {

		if ( $('body').hasClass('append-gallery') ) {
			$('#posts').children('.jq:visible').children('article:last').after( $('#posts').children('article') );
		}

		$('ul.social-icons-list li a.btn-more-mobile').remove();
		$('.pop-share').append('<a href="javascript:void(0)" class="btn-more-mobile icon-more" title="Mais"></a>');

    	$('.info-share-new .btn-close, .overlay-share-new').on('click', function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
		    $('.overlay-share-new').fadeOut();
		    $('.info-share-new').fadeOut();

        });

		$('article .bottom-info').on('click', '.btn-more-mobile', function(e){
		    e.preventDefault();
		    var inputDados = $(this).parents('.bottom-info').find('.urlInput');
		    //recolher o título, link do post e copiar o link do input hidden
		    var title_share = inputDados.attr( "name" ),
	            texto_share = inputDados.attr( "placeholder" ),
	            url_share = inputDados.attr( "value" ),
		        hrefWA = "whatsapp://send?text=" + texto_share,
		        hrefDq = url_share + "#comentarios",
		        texto_mailto = "mailto:destinatario@email.com.br?&body=" + encodeURI(texto_share),
		        hrefORonclick = '';

		    //facebook -> url_share
		    if($(window).width() <= 320){
		        var hrefORonclick = 'href',
			        hrefFb = "https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=" + url_share,
			        hrefTw = "http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?source=webclient&text="+ texto_share,
			        hrefGp = "https://plus.google.com/share?url=" + url_share,
			        hrefLk = "http://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=" + url_share;
		    } else{
		        var hrefORonclick = 'onclick';
			        hrefFb = "window.open('https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=" + url_share + "', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');",
			        hrefTw = "window.open('http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?source=webclient&text="+ texto_share +"', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');",
			        hrefGp = "window.open('https://plus.google.com/share?url=" + url_share + "', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');",
			        hrefLk = "window.open('http://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=" + url_share + "', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');";
		    }

		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.facebook a').attr( hrefORonclick, hrefFb);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.twitter a').attr( hrefORonclick, hrefTw);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.google-plus a').attr( hrefORonclick, hrefGp);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.linkedin a').attr('onclick', hrefLk);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.whatsapp a').attr('href', hrefWA);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.btn-comments a').attr('href', hrefDq);
		    //email -> texto_email
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.email a').attr('href', texto_mailto);
		    //show overlay & share
		    $('.overlay-share-new').fadeIn();
		    $('.info-share-new').fadeIn();

		});

        $('article').each(function() {
        	console.log('nav');
            var self = $(this),
                selectorInput = $(this).find('.urlInput').val(),
                o = $(this).find('.facebook-count'),
                // c = $(this).find('.twitter-count'),
                e = $(this).find('.google-count');
        	console.log(selectorInput);
        	console.log('-----');
            $.getJSON( 'http://graph.facebook.com/?id=' + selectorInput, function( fbdata ) {
                o.text(fbdata.share.share_count);
            });
            // $.getJSON( 'http://cdn.api.twitter.com/1/urls/count.json?url=' + selectorInput + '&callback=?', function( twitdata ) {
            //     c.text(twitdata.count);
            // });
            $.ajax({
    		  type: 'POST',
    		  url: 'https://clients6.google.com/rpc',
    		  processData: true,
    		  contentType: 'application/json',
    		  data: JSON.stringify({
    		    'method':'pos.plusones.get',
    		        'id':'p',
    		        'params':{
    		            'nolog':true,
    		            'id':selectorInput,
    		            'source':'widget',
    		            'userId':'@viewer',
    		            'groupId':'@self'
    		            },
    		        'jsonrpc':'2.0',
    		        'key':'p',
    		        'apiVersion':'v1'
    		  }),
    		  success: function(response) {
    		    e.text(response.result.metadata.globalCounts.count);
    		  }
    		});

    		// $.ajax({
    		// 	type: 'GET',
    		// 	url: window.location.protocol + "//disqus.com/api/3.0/threads/set.jsonp",
    		// 	data: { api_key: disqusPublicKey, forum : disqusShortname, thread : urlArray }, // URL method
    		// 	cache: false,
    		// 	dataType: "jsonp",
    		// 	success: function (result) {
      //   			console.log(result);
    		// 		for (var i in result.response) {
    		// 			var count = result.response[i].posts;
    		// 			$('a[data-disqus-url="' + selectorInput + '"]').children('span').html(count);
    		// 		}
    		// 	}
    		// });
        })

		setTimeout(function(){
			if ( $('a.disqus-comment-count') ) {
				if ( !$('a.disqus-comment-count').find('.firstWord').length) {
				     $('a.disqus-comment-count').each(function() {
				     	var text = $(this).html().trim().split(" ");
				     	var first = text.shift();
				     	$(this).html((text.length > 0 ? "<span class='firstWord'>"+ first + "</span> " : first) + text.join(" "));
				     });
				}
			}
		}, 2000);

	}
</script>

</div>

<div class="box">	
<section id="main-banner" style="background-image:url(http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/banner-br.jpg)">
	
	<div class="container">
	
	

		<div class="newsletter-box open">
			<!-- <p><span class="closed"></span><span class="opened"></span></p> -->
			<p><span class="closed">Assine a Newsletter</span><span class="opened">Preencha abaixo e receba <br>minhas mensagens <br>diariamente por e-mail.</span></p>

			<form action="http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/newsletter/" id="newsletter-form">
				<label for="nome">Nome</label>
				<input type="text" name="nome" id="nome" placeholder="Nome" title="Nome">
					<label for="email">Insira seu e-mail</label>
				<input type="email" name="email" id="email" placeholder="Insira seu e-mail" title="Insira seu e-mail">
				<button type="submit" class="btn-submit">OK</button>
			</form><!-- newsletter-form -->

			<a href="javascript:void(0)" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation" class="btn-open" title="Abrir">fechar</a>
		</div><!-- newsletter-box -->

		<div class="newsletter-box-feedback open" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation" style="display:none">
			<p>Quase no final... Precisamos confirmar o seu endereço de e-mail. <br>Para concluir o processo de assinatura, clique no link existente no e-mail que <br>acabamos de enviar para você.</p>
			<p>Email <em class="form-email">email@email.com</em> já cadastrado. Para atualizar o cadastro, <a href="javascript:void(0)" target="_blank" class="link-cadastro" title="clique aqui">clique aqui</a></p>
		</div><!-- newsletter-box -->


		<script>
			$(function() {
				$('form#newsletter-form').submit(function(e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					var email = $('input#email').val(),
						nome = $('input#nome').val(),
						filtro = /^([\w-]+(?:\.[\w-]+)*)@((?:[\w-]+\.)*\w[\w-]{0,66})\.([a-z]{2,6}(?:\.[a-z]{2})?)$/i;;

					var self = $(this);
					var url = self.attr('action');

					self.find('.btn-submit').addClass('off').prop("disabled", true);

					if (email != "" || nome != "") {
						if (filtro.test(email)) {

							$.post(url, self.serialize(), function(data) {

								if ( data === 'sucesso' ) {
									$(".newsletter-box-feedback").children('p:last').hide();
									$(".newsletter-box").hide();
									$(".newsletter-box-feedback").fadeIn();
									self[0].reset();
								} else {
									var dataJson = JSON.parse(data),
										dataCodigo = dataJson.codigo,
										dataMSG = dataJson.msg;

									if ( dataCodigo === 214 ) {
										var link1 = dataMSG.match(/http[s]?:\/\/[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,}.*"/);
										var link = link1[0].replace('"', '');
										$(".newsletter-box-feedback").children('p:first').hide();
										$(".newsletter-box-feedback").children('p:last').find('.form-email').html(email);
										$(".newsletter-box-feedback").children('p:last').find('.link-cadastro').attr('href', link);
										$(".newsletter-box").hide();
										$(".newsletter-box-feedback").fadeIn();
									} else {
										alert( 'Erro '+dataCodigo+' ao cadastrar o e-mail' );
									}

								}
								self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
							});

						} else {
							$("#email").val("Este endereço de email não é válido!");
							self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
							return false;
						} // if regex email
					} else { // if email || nome
						$("#email").val('Digite um email!');
						self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
						return false;
					}
				});
			})
	</script>

	</div><!-- container -->
</section><!-- main-banner -->

<article class="post-" id="post-37737">
	<figure>
		<a href="http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/2017/03/26/buscar-se-guardar/" title="Buscar se guardar">
			<img width="706" height="471" src="http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/shutterstock_506868130-706x471.jpg" class="attachment-img-list size-img-list wp-post-image" alt="shutterstock_506868130" srcset="http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/shutterstock_506868130-706x471.jpg 706w, http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/shutterstock_506868130-300x200.jpg 300w, http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/shutterstock_506868130-768x512.jpg 768w, http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/shutterstock_506868130.jpg 1000w" sizes="(max-width: 706px) 100vw, 706px" />		</a>

<script>
    $('article').each(function() {
        var self = $(this),
            selectorInput = $(this).find('.urlInput').val(),
            o = $(this).find('.facebook-count'),
            // c = $(this).find('.twitter-count'),
            e = $(this).find('.google-count');
        $.getJSON( 'http://graph.facebook.com/?id=' + selectorInput, function( fbdata ) {
            o.text(fbdata.share.share_count);
        }),
        // $.getJSON( 'http://cdn.api.twitter.com/1/urls/count.json?url=' + selectorInput + '&callback=?', function( twitdata ) {
        //     c.text(twitdata.count);
        // });
        $.ajax({
		  type: 'POST',
		  url: 'https://clients6.google.com/rpc',
		  processData: true,
		  contentType: 'application/json',
		  data: JSON.stringify({
		    'method':'pos.plusones.get',
		        'id':'p',
		        'params':{
		            'nolog':true,
		            'id':selectorInput,
		            'source':'widget',
		            'userId':'@viewer',
		            'groupId':'@self'
		            },
		        'jsonrpc':'2.0',
		        'key':'p',
		        'apiVersion':'v1'
		  }),
		  success: function(response) {
		    e.text(response.result.metadata.globalCounts.count);
		  }
		});
    })
</script>
			</main>

<script>
	$(function() {
		$('a.btn-change-src').click(function(e) {
			e.preventDefault();

			var self = $(this),
				src = self.children('img').attr('src'),
				href = self.attr('href'),
				hrefFb = "window.open('https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=" + href + "', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');",
				hrefTw = "window.open('http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?source=webclient&text=FonteaJorrar: "+ href +"', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');",
				hrefGp = "window.open('https://plus.google.com/share?url=" + href + "', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');";

			$('div.lightbox a.icon-facebook').parent().attr('onclick', hrefFb);
			$('div.lightbox a.icon-twitter').parent().attr('onclick', hrefTw);
			$('div.lightbox a.icon-google-plus').parent().attr('onclick', hrefGp);
			$('div.overlay img.lightbox-img').attr('src', src);

			$('header').addClass('fix-zindex');

			$('body > div.box > div.overlay').eq(0).fadeIn(400);
			$('body > div.box > div.overlay').removeClass('zoomin')
		});

		$('.overlay .lightbox').on('click', 'a.btn-close', function(e) {
			e.preventDefault();
			$('div.overlay').fadeOut(300);
			$('div.overlay').addClass('zoomin');
			$('header').removeClass('fix-zindex');
		});

		$('.btn-share-img-mobile').on('click', function(e){
			e.preventDefault();
			$(this).parents('.share-img').next().fadeIn();
			$(this).parents('.share-img').next().next().fadeIn();
		});
	});
</script>

                <span>ESPERE! TENHO UMA PERGUNTA PARA VOCÊ!</span>
                <p>Sabia que você pode receber as minhas mensagens <br>todos os dias diretamente no seu e-mail? <br>É simples! Basta preencher seu nome e e-mail abaixo:</p>
                <div class="newsletter-feedback-modal">
                    <p>Quase no final... Precisamos confirmar o seu endereço de e-mail. <br>Para concluir o processo de assinatura, clique no link existente no e-mail que <br>acabamos de enviar para você.</p>
                    <p>Seu e-mail já consta na base de dados do meu site.</p>
                </div>
                <form action="http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/newsletter/" id="newsletter-form-modal">
                    <label for="nome-modal">Nome</label>
                    <input type="text" name="nome" id="nome-modal" placeholder="Nome" title="Nome">
                    <label for="email-modal">Insira seu e-mail</label>
                    <input type="email" name="email" id="email-modal" placeholder="Insira seu e-mail" title="Insira seu e-mail">
                    <input type="submit" class="btn-submit" value="Sim, eu desejo receber as mensagens.">
                </form>
            </div>
            <div class="info-bispo-newsletter">
                <figure>
                    <img src="http://blogs.universal.org/fonteajorrar/wp-content/themes/fonteajorrar/assets/img/ester-bezerra.jpg" alt="">
                    <figcaption>
                        <p>A mulher sábia é virtuosa e os seus pensamentos estão de acordo com os Pensamentos de Deus. Antes de agir, ela medita, pesa e avalia suas atitudes.</p>
                        <small>Ester Bezerra</small>

<script>
    $(function() {
        $('form#newsletter-form-modal').submit(function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var email = $('input#email-modal').val(),
                nome = $('input#nome-modal').val(),
                filtro = /^([\w-]+(?:\.[\w-]+)*)@((?:[\w-]+\.)*\w[\w-]{0,66})\.([a-z]{2,6}(?:\.[a-z]{2})?)$/i;;

            var self = $(this);
            var url = self.attr('action');

            self.find('.btn-submit').addClass('off').prop("disabled", true);

            if (email != "" || nome != "") {
                if (filtro.test(email)) {

                    $.post(url, self.serialize(), function(data) {

                        if ( data === 'sucesso' ) {
                            $(".newsletter-feedback-modal").children('p:last').hide().parent().slideDown('fast');
                            self[0].reset();
                        } else {
                            var dataJson = JSON.parse(data),
                                dataCodigo = dataJson.codigo,
                                dataMSG = dataJson.msg;

                            if ( dataCodigo === 214 ) {
                                $(".newsletter-feedback-modal").children('p:first').hide().parent().slideDown('fast');
                            } else {
                                alert( 'Erro '+dataCodigo+' ao cadastrar o e-mail' );
                            }
                        }
                        self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
                    });

                } else {
                    $("#email-modal").val("Este endereço de email não é válido!");
                    self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
                    return false;
                } // if regex email
            } else { // if email || nome
                $("#email-modal").val('Digite um email!');
                self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
                return false;
            }
        });

    })
</script>

                classCtnContent             : 'anarkSlide-content',
                classCtnThumbnail           : 'anarkSlide-thumbnail',
                classCtnThumbnailContent    : 'anarkSlide-content',
                classCtnThumbnailCover      : 'anarkSlide-thumbnail-cover',
                classCtnThumbnailCaption    : 'anarkSlide-thumbnail-caption',

                numTotalSlide : '',
                numWithCtnThumbnails : '',
                numWithCtnThumbnailsEmPixel : '',
                numHeightCtnThumbnails : '',

                init : function(obj,arrParams){
                    arrParams = Util.setValDefault(arrParams,{ });
                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numTotalSlide = obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide).length;
                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numWithCtnThumbnails = 100/AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numTotalSlide;


                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numHeightCtnThumbnails = obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide+':eq(0)').innerHeight();
                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numWithCtnThumbnailsEmPixel = obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide+':eq(0)').innerWidth();
                    obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide).css({ width:AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numWithCtnThumbnails+'%' });

                    var htmlThumbnails = obj.html();
                    obj.html('');
                    obj.prepend("<div class='"+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSliderAtivo+"'></div>");
                    obj.append("<div class='"+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnThumbnails+"'></div>");
                    obj.append('<div class="barra-transicao"><div></div></div>').find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnThumbnails).append('<div style="clear:both;"></div>').animate({ opacity:'1' },500);


                    obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnThumbnails).html(htmlThumbnails).find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide).each(function(i){
                        var objSlide = $(this);

                        objSlide.find(' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnThumbnail).prepend(objSlide.find(' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnContent+' img.imagem').clone()).find('img.imagem');

                        var src = objSlide.find(' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnThumbnail+' img.imagem').attr('src');

                        if(src.indexOf('?')!==-1){
                            src = src.replace(/w\=[0-9]*\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/h\=[0-9]*\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/x\=[0-9]*\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/y\=[0-9]*\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/cp\=true\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/cp\=1\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/npcp\=[0-9.]*\&?/i, "");
                        }else{
                            src = src+'?';
                        }
                        var width=Math.ceil(objSlide.innerWidth());
                        src = src+'cp=1&x=78&y=51';
                        //src = src+'w='+( (width>25)?width:90 );
                        //var height = Math.ceil(Util.setValDefault(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numHeightCtnThumbnails,70));
                        //src = src+'&h='+( (height>30)?height:70 );
                        //src = src+'&cp=true';

                        objSlide.find(' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnThumbnail+' img.imagem').attr('src',src);



                        objSlide.on('click',function(){
                            AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.mostrarSlide(obj,i);
                        });
                    });
                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.mostrarSlide(obj,0);


                },

                mostrarSlide : function(obj,i){
                    var htmlSlidePrincipal = obj.data('slide-ativo',i).find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnThumbnails+' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide).removeClass('active').eq(i).addClass('active').find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnThumbnailContent).html();

                    obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide).css({ backgroundColor:'' });
                    obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSliderAtivo).fadeOut(100,function(){
                        var objSliderAtivo = $(this);
                        objSliderAtivo.html(htmlSlidePrincipal).fadeIn(200);
                        obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide+'.active').css({ backgroundColor:obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide+'.active').data('cor-forte') });
                        objSliderAtivo.css({ backgroundColor:obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide+'.active').data('cor-forte') });
                    });
                    var iProximo = ((i+1)>=AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numTotalSlide)?0:i+1;
                    obj.data('slide-proximo',i);


                    if(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.numTotalSlide>1){

                        obj.find('.anarkSlide-thumbnail-cover').stop().css({  width:'0%'  });
                        //obj.find('.barra-transicao div').stop().css({ width:'0%' }).animate({ width:'100%' },50000,'linear',function(){
                        obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.classCtnSlide+'.active').find('.anarkSlide-thumbnail-cover').stop().css({ width:'0%' }).animate({ width:'100%' },5000,'linear',function(){

                            AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.mostrarSlide(obj,iProximo);
                        });
                    }
                    /*
                     if(typeof(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.settimeoutinstance)!=null && typeof(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.settimeoutinstance)!='undefined'){
                     clearTimeout(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.settimeoutinstance);
                     }
                     AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.settimeoutinstance = setTimeout(function(){
                     AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.mostrarSlide(obj,iProximo);
                     },2000);
                     */
                }

            }
            $(function(){
                AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_3.init($('#anarkSlide_3'));
            });
        </script>
        <style type="text/css">
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide{ min-height: 200px; border:1px solid #999999; border-bottom:0px; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .barra-transicao{ height: 1px; background-color:#CCCCCC; clear: both; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .barra-transicao div{ height: inherit; width: 0%; float: left; background-color: #000000; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo{ background-color: #000000; }



            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo>a>div{ color:#FFF !important; height: 80px; display: table-cell !important; vertical-align: middle !important; font-size: 15px !important; font-weight: 600; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo>a>div>div{ padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo>a>div>div>strong{ margin-bottom: 4px; display: block; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 12px;  font-weight: 600; }

            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails{ background-color: #e2e2e2; display: block;  opacity:0; filter:alpha(opacity=0);}
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide{ opacity:0.5; filter:alpha(opacity=50); padding-left: 2px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px; padding-right: 2px; float: left;  height: 70px; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide.active,
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide:hover{ opacity:1 !important; filter:alpha(opacity=100) !important; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide.active{  }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-content{ display: none;  }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail{ overflow: hidden; width: 80%; height: 70%; margin-left: 7px; margin-top: 10px;  position: relative;  }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail>*{  width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; cursor: pointer; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail>*:not(img){  }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail .anarkSlide-thumbnail-caption{ text-align: center; vertical-align: middle !important; font-weight: 800; font-size: 10px; color:#FFF !important; text-shadow: 1px 1px 5px #000000; opacity:0; filter:alpha(opacity=0); text-overflow: clip !important; line-height: 13px; }
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide.active .anarkSlide-thumbnail .anarkSlide-thumbnail-caption,
            .conteudo_bloco_3 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails:hover .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail .anarkSlide-thumbnail-caption{ display: table-cell !important; vertical-align: middle !important; opacity:1; filter:alpha(opacity=100); }
        </style>

                            <div class="ctnImgMouseOver" style="; padding-bottom:6px;">
                                    <div class="ctnTexto">
        <div onclick="window.location.href='http://www.r7triangulo.com.br/noticias/atualidades/espertinho-preso-por-espiar-mulheres-no-banheiro-do-aeroporto-slg-2';" class="restante"></div>

            <span class="texto">compartilhe</span>

            <span class="botoes">

            <div style="display: none;">
                <div class="conteudo_bloco_16  " style="overflow: hidden;">
        


        
                    <a href="#" class="conteudo-bloco-nome-bloco" style="border-color: #000000;">
                Slider 02
            </a>
        
        <script type="text/javascript">
            AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16 = {
                classCtnSliderAtivo         : 'anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo',
                classCtnThumbnails          : 'anarkSlide-content-thumbnails',

                classCtnSlide               : 'anarkSlide-slide',
                classCtnContent             : 'anarkSlide-content',
                classCtnThumbnail           : 'anarkSlide-thumbnail',
                classCtnThumbnailContent    : 'anarkSlide-content',
                classCtnThumbnailCover      : 'anarkSlide-thumbnail-cover',
                classCtnThumbnailCaption    : 'anarkSlide-thumbnail-caption',

                numTotalSlide : '',
                numWithCtnThumbnails : '',
                numWithCtnThumbnailsEmPixel : '',
                numHeightCtnThumbnails : '',

                init : function(obj,arrParams){
                    arrParams = Util.setValDefault(arrParams,{ });
                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numTotalSlide = obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide).length;
                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numWithCtnThumbnails = 100/AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numTotalSlide;


                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numHeightCtnThumbnails = obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide+':eq(0)').innerHeight();
                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numWithCtnThumbnailsEmPixel = obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide+':eq(0)').innerWidth();
                    obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide).css({ width:AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numWithCtnThumbnails+'%' });

                    var htmlThumbnails = obj.html();
                    obj.html('');
                    obj.prepend("<div class='"+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSliderAtivo+"'></div>");
                    obj.append("<div class='"+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnThumbnails+"'></div>");
                    obj.append('<div class="barra-transicao"><div></div></div>').find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnThumbnails).append('<div style="clear:both;"></div>').animate({ opacity:'1' },500);


                    obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnThumbnails).html(htmlThumbnails).find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide).each(function(i){
                        var objSlide = $(this);

                        objSlide.find(' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnThumbnail).prepend(objSlide.find(' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnContent+' img.imagem').clone()).find('img.imagem');

                        var src = objSlide.find(' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnThumbnail+' img.imagem').attr('src');

                        if(src.indexOf('?')!==-1){
                            src = src.replace(/w\=[0-9]*\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/h\=[0-9]*\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/x\=[0-9]*\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/y\=[0-9]*\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/cp\=true\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/cp\=1\&?/i, "");
                            src = src.replace(/npcp\=[0-9.]*\&?/i, "");
                        }else{
                            src = src+'?';
                        }
                        var width=Math.ceil(objSlide.innerWidth());
                        src = src+'x=73&y=60&cp=1';
                        //src = src+'w='+( (width>25)?width:90 );
                        //var height = Math.ceil(Util.setValDefault(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numHeightCtnThumbnails,70));
                        //src = src+'&h='+( (height>30)?height:70 );
                        //src = src+'&cp=true';

                        objSlide.find(' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnThumbnail+' img.imagem').attr('src',src);



                        objSlide.on('click',function(){
                            AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.mostrarSlide(obj,i);
                        });
                    });
                    AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.mostrarSlide(obj,0);


                },

                mostrarSlide : function(obj,i){
                    var htmlSlidePrincipal = obj.data('slide-ativo',i).find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnThumbnails+' .'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide).removeClass('active').eq(i).addClass('active').find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnThumbnailContent).html();

                    obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide).css({ backgroundColor:'' });
                    obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSliderAtivo).fadeOut(100,function(){
                        var objSliderAtivo = $(this);
                        objSliderAtivo.html(htmlSlidePrincipal).fadeIn(200);
                        obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide+'.active').css({ backgroundColor:obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide+'.active').data('cor-forte') });
                        objSliderAtivo.css({ backgroundColor:obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide+'.active').data('cor-forte') });
                    });
                    var iProximo = ((i+1)>=AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numTotalSlide)?0:i+1;
                    obj.data('slide-proximo',i);


                    if(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.numTotalSlide>1){

                        obj.find('.anarkSlide-thumbnail-cover').stop().css({  width:'0%'  });
                        //obj.find('.barra-transicao div').stop().css({ width:'0%' }).animate({ width:'100%' },50000,'linear',function(){
                        obj.find('.'+AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.classCtnSlide+'.active').find('.anarkSlide-thumbnail-cover').stop().css({ width:'0%' }).animate({ width:'100%' },5000,'linear',function(){

                            AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.mostrarSlide(obj,iProximo);
                        });
                    }
                    /*
                     if(typeof(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.settimeoutinstance)!=null && typeof(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.settimeoutinstance)!='undefined'){
                     clearTimeout(AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.settimeoutinstance);
                     }
                     AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.settimeoutinstance = setTimeout(function(){
                     AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.mostrarSlide(obj,iProximo);
                     },2000);
                     */
                }

            }
            $(function(){
                AnarkSlide_conteudo_bloco_16.init($('#anarkSlide_16'));
            });
        </script>
        <style type="text/css">
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide{ min-height: 200px; border:1px solid #999999; border-bottom:0px; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .barra-transicao{ height: 1px; background-color:#CCCCCC; clear: both; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .barra-transicao div{ height: inherit; width: 0%; float: left; background-color: #000000; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo{ background-color: #000000; }



            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo>a>div{ color:#FFF !important; height: 80px; display: table-cell !important; vertical-align: middle !important; font-size: 15px !important; font-weight: 600; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo>a>div>div{ padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-slider-ativo>a>div>div>strong{ margin-bottom: 4px; display: block; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 12px;  font-weight: 600; }

            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails{ background-color: #e2e2e2; display: block;  opacity:0; filter:alpha(opacity=0);}
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide{ opacity:0.5; filter:alpha(opacity=50); padding-left: 2px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px; padding-right: 2px; float: left;  height: 70px; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide.active,
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide:hover{ opacity:1 !important; filter:alpha(opacity=100) !important; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide.active{  }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-content{ display: none;  }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail{ overflow: hidden; width: 80%; height: 70%; margin-left: 7px; margin-top: 10px;  position: relative;  }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail>*{  width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; cursor: pointer; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail>*:not(img){  }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail .anarkSlide-thumbnail-caption{ text-align: center; vertical-align: middle !important; font-weight: 800; font-size: 10px; color:#FFF !important; text-shadow: 1px 1px 5px #000000; opacity:0; filter:alpha(opacity=0); text-overflow: clip !important; line-height: 13px; }
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails .anarkSlide-slide.active .anarkSlide-thumbnail .anarkSlide-thumbnail-caption,
            .conteudo_bloco_16 .anarkSlide .anarkSlide-content-thumbnails:hover .anarkSlide-slide .anarkSlide-thumbnail .anarkSlide-thumbnail-caption{ display: table-cell !important; vertical-align: middle !important; opacity:1; filter:alpha(opacity=100); }
        </style>

        <script type='text/javascript'>
          var makeShortcut = function(keyNumber, locationHref, fn) {
            var shortcuts = [
                'alt+' + keyNumber,
                'shift+alt+' + keyNumber,
                'command+' + keyNumber,
                'ctrl+' + keyNumber
            ],
            _fn = fn || function() {
                window.location = locationHref;
            };
            Mousetrap.bind(shortcuts, function() {
                _fn();
                return false;
            });
          };
          // página inicial
          makeShortcut(1, '');
          // ir para conteúdo
          makeShortcut(2, '#', function() {
              scroll(0,0);
          });
          // mapa do site
          makeShortcut(3, '');
          // foco no campo de busca
          makeShortcut(4, '');
          // informações de contato (página Fale com o R7)
          makeShortcut(9, '');
          // detalhes das teclas de atalho (página Acessibilidade)
          makeShortcut(0, '');
        </script>

<section id="container">

					<div class="legenda" style="background: ;">
							<h3><a href="https://www.facebook.com/institutoressoar" target="_blank">Acompanhe o Ressoar</a></h3>
							<p><a href="https://www.facebook.com/institutoressoar" target="_blank">Notícia boa você só encontra aqui, no Ressoar, acompanhe em nossas redes sociais todos os acontecimentos.</a></p>

								<li>
					<a href="" target="_blank"><img width="1100" height="365" src="http://www.ressoar.org.br/files/2017/02/Banner-Site.jpg" class="attachment-banner" alt="Banner Site" title="Banner Site" /></a>
					<div class="legenda" style="background: ;">
							<h3><a href="" target="_blank">Ressoar na Record News</a></h3>
							<p><a href="" target="_blank">O programa Ressoar é uma revista eletrônica do Terceiro Setor, que trata de maneira direta questões como Responsabilidade Social, Cidadania, Meio Ambiente e Inclusão Social.

O programa Ressoar é apresentado pelo Reinaldo Gottino e vai ao ar na Record News todos os domingos, às 17h00 e reprises domingo às 05h00 e sábado às 12h30.</a></p>
					</div>
				</li>
							</ul>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="row destaques" id="destaques">
