        <script>
                (function() {
                    var error = "";

                    if (error) {
                        alert(error);
                    }

                    var sucesso = "";
                    if (sucesso) {
                        alert("Currículo enviado.");
                    }
                    
                    $('#send').click(function(){
                        var valido = true;
                        $('input').each(function(){
                            if($(this).val() == '' && $(this).attr('alt') != ''){
                                alert('O campos '+$(this).attr('alt')+' é obrigatórios');
                                valido = false;
                                return false;
                            }
                        });
                        if(valido){
                            $("#sendCV-form").submit();                        
                        }
                    });
                    
                    // trim polyfill : https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/Trim
                    if (!String.prototype.trim) {
                        (function() {
                            // Make sure we trim BOM and NBSP
                            var rtrim = /^[\s\uFEFF\xA0]+|[\s\uFEFF\xA0]+$/g;
                            String.prototype.trim = function() {
                                return this.replace(rtrim, '');
                            };
                        })();
                    }

                    [].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('input.input__field')).forEach(function(inputEl) {
                        // in case the input is already filled..
                        if (inputEl.value.trim() !== '') {
                            classie.add(inputEl.parentNode, 'input--filled');
                        }

                        // events:
                        inputEl.addEventListener('focus', onInputFocus);
                        inputEl.addEventListener('blur', onInputBlur);
                    });

                    function onInputFocus(ev) {
                        classie.add(ev.target.parentNode, 'input--filled');
                    }

                    function onInputBlur(ev) {
                        if (ev.target.value.trim() === '') {
                            classie.remove(ev.target.parentNode, 'input--filled');
                        }
                    }
                })();
        </script>

setActive(a){document.getElementById("main-menu-wrapper").removeAttribute("class");var b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>

    <a href="http://blogs.odia.ig.com.br/justicaecidadania/2017/03/27/secretaria-nao-responde-a-ataque-do-tj-contra-atraso-no-pagamento-de-salarios/" title="Secretaria evita atacar o TJ contra atraso de salários dos magistrados">
        <small class="chapeu">crise no estado</small>
        <h2 class="chamada">Secretaria evita atacar o TJ contra atraso de salários dos magistrados</h2>
        <p class="descricao">Presidente do Tribunal de Justiça do Rio, desembargador Milton Fernandes de Souza, avisou: 'Vamos adotar medidas cabíveis'</p>
    </a>
</div><div class="ODICHE00803 grid-3 entre-componentes nomgr" id="67211363-F6FD-4CA5-9FD1-8DF99C8D4A35">
    <a href="http://odia.ig.com.br/esporte/2017-03-27/de-saida-manchester-prepara-proposta-milionaria-e-pode-tirar-neymar-do-barca.html" title="Proposta do Manchester pode tirar Neymar do Barça">
        <small class="chapeu">De saída? </small>
        <h2 class="chamada">Proposta do Manchester pode tirar Neymar do Barça</h2>
        <div class="bloco">
            <figure>
                <img src="http://ejesa.statig.com.br/bancodeimagens/7h/nh/k1/7hnhk114cmlulv7t8iibzfvsy.jpg" alt="Proposta do Manchester pode tirar Neymar do Barça" />
            </figure>
            <p>Clube estaria disposto a pagar a multa rescisória do atacante brasileiro</p>
        </div>
    </a>
</div><div class="ODICHE00803 grid-3 entre-componentes nomgr" id="13FA8800-C254-4030-A1D2-E3C1A07663F7">
    <a href="http://odia.ig.com.br/esporte/carioca/2017-03-27/internautas-nao-perdoam-erros-de-arbitragem-no-classico-flamengo-x-vasco.html" title="Flamengo x Vasco inspira memes nas redes sociais">
        <small class="chapeu">depois do clássico</small>
        <h2 class="chamada">Flamengo x Vasco inspira memes nas redes sociais</h2>
        <div class="bloco">
            <figure>
                <img src="http://ejesa.statig.com.br/bancodeimagens/8d/8o/0h/8d8o0hnobn3tz2ft5i5dtb3gm.jpg" alt="Flamengo x Vasco inspira memes nas redes sociais" />
            </figure>
            <p>Pênalti polêmico e empate são motivo de piada entre internautas</p>
        </div>
    </a>
</div><div class="ODILIA00406 grid-6 entre-componentes nomgr" id="1F09278E-F169-40CE-8B27-3FF9F0261352">
	<section>          
	    <div class="ODICHE00903 grid-2">
	        <a href="http://odia.ig.com.br/rio-de-janeiro/2017-03-27/bombeiros-encontram-corpo-de-triatleta-que-sumiu-durante-competicao.html" title="Corpo de triatleta é encontrado na praia do Recreio">
	        	<figure>
		            <img src="http://ejesa.statig.com.br/bancodeimagens/98/qf/3k/98qf3ksscocpnt152dc6tq30a.jpg" alt="Corpo de triatleta é encontrado na praia do Recreio" />
		        </figure>
	            <small class="chapeu">morreu no mar</small>
	            <h2 class="chamada">Corpo de triatleta é encontrado na praia do Recreio</h2>

        <div class="ODICHE01103 grid-3" ng-repeat="feed in feeds" ng-class="{noright:!(($index + 1) % 4), noleft:!($index % 4), 'com-foto' : (feed.urlImgEmp_316x198)}">
            <a href="{{feed.url}}" title="{{feed.titulo}}" ng-click="AddPoint($index)">
                <figure ng-if="feed.urlImgEmp_316x198">
                    <img class="photo" src="{{feed.urlImgEmp_316x198}}" />
                </figure>
                <small class="chapeu" ng-bind="formatDate('{{feed.startDate}}') + ' - ' + mioloPao('{{feed.secaoBreadcrumb}}')"></small>

                    <li class="facebook" data-url="{{feed.url}}">

<script>

    function shareWindow(wprop,hprop,vurl){
        var _h, _g;
        _h = (window.innerWidth / 2) - (wprop / 2);
        _g = (window.innerHeight / 2) - (hprop / 2);
        window.open(vurl, "", "toolbar=no, location=no, directories=no, status=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=no, resizable=no, copyhistory=no, width=" + wprop + ", height=" + hprop + ", top=" + _g + ", left=" + _h);
    }

    $(document).ready(function() {

        $(document).on('click', '.quickly-share .facebook', function() {
            var _mywidth = 626, _myheight = 436, _url = '';
            _url = 'https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=';
            _url += encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-url'));
            
            shareWindow(_mywidth,_myheight,_url);
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.quickly-share .twitter', function() {
            var _mywidth = 685, _myheight = 500, _url = '', _title = $(this).attr('data-title');
            
            _url = 'http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=' + _title + '&url=';
            _url += encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-url'));
            
            shareWindow(_mywidth,_myheight,_url);
        });
        
    });

</script></div><div class="EJEHTML00112" id="293FC1EE-4415-408A-852E-8BDB0E945297">

<script>
    var empilhamentoMaislidas = (function() {

    	var json;

    	var maisLidas = function (periodo, limite) {

			switch(periodo) {
				case 'today':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
				break;
				case 'weekend':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-weekend.json';
				break;
				case 'week':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-week.json';
				break;
				case 'month':
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-month.json';
				break;
				default:
					json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/mostviewed/ga-odia-most-viewed-today.json';
			}

			$('.ODILA00103 ul').html('<li style="border-bottom:0;"><img src="http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/img/odia20/ring.gif" width="30" height="30"></li>');

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {

				var html = '';
				var i = 1;
                
	            $.each(data.registros, function(key, val) {

	            	if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {
	            		html += '<li class="titulo entre-componentes"><a href="' + val.url + '" title="' + val.title + '">' + val.title + '</a></li>';
	                }
	                i++;

	            });

	            $('.ODILA00103 ul').html(html);

	        });

    	}

    	return {
            maisLidas: maisLidas
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	empilhamentoMaislidas.maisLidas('today', 5);

    });
</script></div></div><div id="34D3C408-B07F-408A-9080-95A3117C4C73" class="faixa-3"><div class="EJEHTML00112" id="E171FEB8-5DFD-477C-A79D-8369F1C90EB8">
	<div><div style="margin-top:50px;" class="fb-page grid-3" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/odiajornal/" data-tabs="timeline" data-width="301" data-height="600" data-small-header="true" data-adapt-container-width="true" data-hide-cover="false" data-show-facepile="true"><blockquote cite="https://www.facebook.com/odiajornal/" class="fb-xfbml-parse-ignore"><a href="https://www.facebook.com/odiajornal/">Jornal O Dia</a></blockquote></div></div>

		</form>

		<div class="progress "></div>

	<div id="bx-pager">
		<a data-slide-index="0" href="">Veículos</a>
		<a data-slide-index="1" href="">Imóveis</a>
		<a data-slide-index="2" href="">Empregos</a>
		<a data-slide-index="3" href="">Serviços e Produtos</a>

<script>
    var destaquesClassificados = (function() {

    	var vitrine = function (limite) {

			var json = 'http://s0.ejesa.ig.com.br/json/odia/classificados/highlights.json';

			$.getJSON(json, function( data ) {
				
				var html = '';
                
	            $.each(data, function(key, val) {

	            	var i = 1;

	            	html += '<li>';
					html += '	<ul>';

	            	$.each(val, function(key2, val2) {

	            		var title 		= val2.title;
	            		var description = val2.description;
	            		var city 		= val2.city;
	            		var estate 		= val2.estate;
	            		var price 		= val2.price;
	            		var thumb 		= val2.thumb;
	            		var url 		= val2.url;
	            		var logo		= val2.client.logo;
	            		var url_cliente = val2.client.url;

	            		if(city == null || city == ''){
	            			city = '';
	            		}else{
	            			city = city +' - ';
	            		}

	            		if(price == null || price == '' || price == '0,00'){
	            			price = '';
	            		}else{
	            			price = 'R$ '+ price;
	            		}

	            		if(i <= parseInt(limite)) {

		            		html += '	<li>';
							html += '		<a href="'+ url +'" target="_classificados">';
							html += '			<img src="'+ thumb +'" width="158" height="100" />';
							html += '			<h3>'+ title.substr(0, 12) +'</h3>';
							html += '			<p>'+ description.substr(0, 50); +'</p>';
							html += '			<h4>'+ city + estate +'</h4>';
							if(val != 'jobs'){
								html += '			<h5>'+ price +'</h5>';
							}
							html += '		</a>';

							if(logo !== null && logo !== '') {
								html += '<div class="logo-client">';
									if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '<a href="'+url_cliente+'" target="_blank">';
									}
		            				html += '<img src="'+ logo +'" width="110" height="50" />';
		            				if(url_cliente != null && url_cliente != '') {
										html += '</a>';
									}
		            			html += '</div>';
		            		}

							html += '	</li>';

						}

						i++;

	            	});

	            	html += '	</ul>';
					html += '</li>';

	            });

	            $('ul.classificado-odia').html(html);

	        });

			vitrineCarrossel();

    	}

    	var vitrineCarrossel = function () {
    		setTimeout(function(){
				$( document ).ready(function() {
					slider = $(".classificado-odia").bxSlider({
						pagerCustom: '#bx-pager',
						auto: true,
						autoControls: false,
						pause: 5000,
						speed:500,
						infiniteLoop:true,
						autoHover: true,
						onSliderLoad: function (currentIndex) {
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideBefore: function(){			
							$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
						},
						onSlideAfter: function(){
							$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						},		
						controls: false
					});
					$( ".classificado-odia" ).mouseenter(function() {
						$(".progress").removeClass( "active" );
					}).mouseleave(function() {
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
					});
					$( "#bx-pager a" ).click(function(){		
						$(".progress").addClass( "active" );
						setTimeout(function(){
						  slider.startAuto();
						}, 200);
					});
				});
				}, 1000);
    	}

    	var vitrineBusca = function () {
    		var form = document.getElementById('form-classificados-busca');
			form.submit();
			return false;
    	}

    	return {
            vitrine: vitrine,
            vitrineCarrossel: vitrineCarrossel,
            vitrineBusca: vitrineBusca
        }

    })();

    $(document).ready(function(){

    	destaquesClassificados.vitrine(6);

    });
</script></div></div></div></section><footer class="footer-odia"><div class="footer-topo"><div class="faixa-12"><div class="grid-6 indices"><h5>Editorial</h5><nav><ul><!-- <li><a <script type="text/javascript">
  var cancelarRefresh;
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
  };
  
  var OT_DELAY = 180000;
  REFRESH_TIMEOUT = null;

  function iniciarRefresh() {
      REFRESH_TIMEOUT = setTimeout(function () {
          window.location.reload();
      }, OT_DELAY);
  }
  iniciarRefresh();
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
    clearTimeout(REFRESH_TIMEOUT);
    console && console.log && console.log("Refresh cancelado");
  };

  $(window).scroll(function(){
      cancelarRefresh();
      iniciarRefresh();
  });

  
</script>

<script>

	var menuOffset = 300;
	$(document).on("scroll", function(){
	       var docScroll = $(document).scrollTop();
	       if(docScroll >= menuOffset) { 
	           $("#floating-bar").addClass("fixed");
			   $("#floating-bar").slideDown(300);
	           //dynamically change the width of floating bar according to it's width of previous state 
	       }else {
			   $("#floating-bar").slideUp(300,function(){
				   $("#floating-bar").removeClass("fixed");
			   });
	       }
	});


</script>

	<!-- Divs flutuantes -->
	




<!-- 
	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-forgotten" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<form method="post" onsubmit="return false;" id="floatForgottenPasswordForm">
				<div class="twelve column top">
					<div class="six column title">
						Recuperar Senha
					</div>
					<div class="six column">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" id="close-forgotten">	
					</div>
				</div>
				<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
				<div class="twelve column form-login">
					<div class="twelve column input">
						<p>Digite o Email de seu cadastro:</p>
						<input type="text" name="reset_loginname" id="input-name" />
					</div>

				</div>	
				<div class="twelve column form-more">
					<div class="six column input">
					</div>
					<div class="six column input">
						<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
					</div>
				</div> 
				<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
			</form>
		</div>	
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		reset_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	reset_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	}
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.resetPassword(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatForgottenPasswordForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>
	
	




<!-- 
	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-login" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
	<form id="floatLoginForm" onsubmit="return false;" method="post">
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<div class="twelve column top">
				<div class="six column title">
					Entrar
				</div>
				<div class="six column">
					<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" class="close-login">	
				</div>
			</div>
			<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
			<div class="twelve column form-login">
				<div class="twelve column input">
					<p>Email
                    <span style="color: #fff">
    
                        6</span></p>
					<input type="text" name="login_loginname" id="input-name" />
				</div>
				<div class="twelve column input">
					<p>Senha</p>
					<input type="password" name="login_password" id="input-pass" />
				</div>
			</div>	
			<div class="twelve column form-more">
				<div class="six column input">
					<a href="#" class="open-forgotten">Esqueci minha senha</a> 
				</div>
				<div class="six column input">
					<a href="javascript:facebooklogin();" class="btn-fb" >
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-fb-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Facebook" title="Logar com Facebook" class="social-plugin bt-login-fb">	
					</a>
					<a href="javascript:twitterlogin();" class="btn-tw">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-tw-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Twitter" title="Logar com Twitter" class="social-plugin bt-login-tw">	
					</a>
					<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
				</div>
			</div> 
		</div>	
		<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
	</form>
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		login_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            },
	            login_password:{
	            	required:true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	login_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	},
            	 login_password:{
 	            	required:"O campo senha é obrigatório"
 	            }
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.login(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatLoginForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>

    <div class="cf slot-item  ">
        






<div class="twelve columns top"><h5>Veja os filmes em cartaz</h5></div>
<div class="twelve columns busca-assunto" data-elemento="cinema-filtror">
    <div class="twelve columns info">
        <div class="twelve columns">
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left"">
                    <select id="PorFilme">
                        <option value="">-- Filmes --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <select id="PorGenero">
                        <option value="">-- Gêneros --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left">
                    <select id="PorCinema">
                        <option value="">-- Cinemas --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <input id="PalavraChave" placeholder="Palavra-chave" type="text" value="">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="twelve columns buscar-filme">
                <button id="BuscaFilme" class="btn">Buscar</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function abreFiltro() {
        var id = $(this).attr("id");
        var value = $(this).val();

        window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?" + id + "=" + value;
    }

    $("#BuscaFilme").click(function () {
        var valor = $("#PalavraChave").val();
        if (valor) {
            window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?busca=" + valor;
        }

        return false;
    });


    var $SELECTS = [$("#PorFilme"), $("#PorGenero"), $("#PorCinema")];

    var json = {"CinemaFiltros":{"PorFilme":{"Registro":[{"ID":"2864","Valor":"A Bela e a Fera"},{"ID":"2876","Valor":"A Grande Muralha"},{"ID":"2860","Valor":"Cinquenta Tons Mais Escuros"},{"ID":"2903","Valor":"Era o Hotel Cambridge"},{"ID":"2900","Valor":"Fragmentado"},{"ID":"2895","Valor":"Hiroshima, Meu Amor"},{"ID":"2890","Valor":"Insubstitu\u00edvel"},{"ID":"2875","Valor":"Internet - O Filme"},{"ID":"2888","Valor":"Kong: A Ilha da Caveira"},{"ID":"2865","Valor":"Lego Batman - O Filme"},{"ID":"2873","Valor":"Lion - Uma Jornada para Casa"},{"ID":"2878","Valor":"Logan"},{"ID":"2881","Valor":"Moonlight: Sob a Luz do Luar"},{"ID":"2897","Valor":"O Filho de Joseph"},{"ID":"2896","Valor":"Pedro Osmar, Pra Liberdade Que Se Conquista"},{"ID":"2902","Valor":"Power Rangers"},{"ID":"2901","Valor":"T2 Trainspotting"},{"ID":"2827","Valor":"Tinha que Ser Ele? (*)"}]},"PorGenero":{"Registro":[{"ID":"1","Valor":"A\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"2","Valor":"Anima\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Aventura"},{"ID":"4","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia Dram\u00e1tica"},{"ID":"6","Valor":"Document\u00e1rio"},{"ID":"7","Valor":"Drama"},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Drama \/ Romance"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Fantasia"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Suspense"}]},"PorCinema":{"Registro":[{"ID":"14","Valor":"Belas"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Betim "},{"ID":"2","Valor":"BH Shopping (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Big"},{"ID":"681","Valor":"Boulevard"},{"ID":"299","Valor":"Cidade"},{"ID":"686","Valor":"Contagem"},{"ID":"10","Valor":"Del Rey"},{"ID":"11","Valor":"Diamond Mall (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"683","Valor":"Esta\u00e7\u00e3o BH"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Ita\u00fa Power Shopping"},{"ID":"12","Valor":"Minas Shopping"},{"ID":"688","Valor":"Monte Carmo "},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Norte"},{"ID":"15","Valor":"Pampulha Mall"},{"ID":"18","Valor":"Paragem"},{"ID":"687","Valor":"Partage Shopping Betim"},{"ID":"8","Valor":"P\u00e1tio Savassi (Cinemark)"},{"ID":"21","Valor":"Ponteio"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Via Shopping"}]}}};
    var cf = json.CinemaFiltros;

    for (var i in $SELECTS) {
        var $select = $SELECTS[i];
        $select.on("change", abreFiltro);
        var id = $select.attr("id");

        var dados = cf[id].Registro;

        for (var j in dados) {
            var item = dados[j];

            var $option = $("<option value='" + item.ID + "'>" + item.Valor + "</option>")

            $select.append($option);
        }
    }

    $("#PorFilme").val("");
    $("#PorGenero").val("");
    $("#PorCinema").val("");


</script>

    </div>

  $(document).ready(function(){

  function openPrettyPhotoIMP(el) {
    var src = $(el).data('image-full');

<script>
          $(function(){

            if (false && window.Polopoly && Polopoly.preview && !$("body").hasClass('super-noticia')) {
              Polopoly.preview.initialize();
              Polopoly.preview.initPageManager();
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.initialize(Polopoly.Localization.Toolbar);
           
              var loadDone = false;
              onLoadDone = function() {
                  if (loadDone) {
                      $("#prf-loadhide").fadeOut(250);
                  } else {
                      loadDone = true;
                  }
              };
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.ready(onLoadDone);
              onLoadDone();
  
              Polopoly.ContextMenu.init();
            }
            
            $("#navigation #ATF_center_300x250").remove();
           
            
        });
</script>

 <div class="comentario">
 <div id="show1">
   <div id="slideshow">
    <div><div style='width:240px; height:90px;'>Participei do curso LDM e GEMPAK (agosto/2011). Foi muito construtivo, pois além de aprender a ferramenta, pude trocar experiências com profissionais de vários lugares do Brasil. </div>
		<div class='pessoa'>   <strong>Caroline Oliveira - Recife/PE</strong>
			<br />17/02/12 - 16h32</div> </div>
<div><div style='width:240px; height:90px;'>No Curso Prático de Calibração de Sensores Meteorológicos (abril/2011) constatei que a confiabilidade de uma calibração é resultado de constantes investimentos em pesquisas e melhorias dos procedimentos. </div>
		<div class='pessoa'>   <strong>Josemar Veiga - Rio de Janeiro/RJ</strong>
			<br />01/02/12 - 15h04</div> </div>

setActive(a){document.getElementById("main-menu-wrapper").removeAttribute("class");var b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>

    <header class="main-header">
      <div class="ig-container">
        <a href="" class="trigger-menu"></a>
        <h1 class="logo-canais">
          <a href="http://turismo.ig.com.br" title="Turismo">
            <img src="//statig0.akamaized.net/sass-canais/canaisiGv01/turismo/images/turismo.png?000002" alt="Turismo" />
          </a>
        </h1>
        <div id="oferecimento"><div id="ad_microbanner"></div></div><div id="busca"><form lang="atmors" action="http://busca.ig.com.br/buscar" method="get" name="search" id="buscaGoogle" enctype="application/x-www-form-urlencoded" accept-charset="UTF-8"><fieldset id="searchContainer"><input type="text" alt="Buscar" title="Buscar" value="" name="q" id="buscar" autocomplete="off" /><input type="hidden" name="o" id="ib_o" value="IGTURISMO" /><input type="hidden" name="c" id="ib_c" value="all" /><input type="hidden" name="t" id="ib_t" value="all" /><input type="hidden" name="d" id="ib_d" value="all" /><input type="hidden" name="p" id="ib_p" value="1" /><input type="hidden" checked="checked" name="s" id="searchScope" value="turismo_content" /><button type="submit" class="botao-buscar" alt="Buscar" title="Buscar" value="Buscar"><span class="icn-search"></span></button></fieldset><div id="searchOn" style="display: none;"><a rel="turismo_content" class="onus">Buscar "<strong></strong>" no <span id="buscaNoCanal">Turismo</span></a><a rel="ig_content" class="onig">Buscar "<strong></strong>" no iG</a></div><div id="searchOnBottom" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div></form></div>
      </div>
      <div id="menu-N">  <nav class="subHome-nav">    <ul><li class="subHome-nav__item">  <a title="Destinos Nacionais" href="http://turismo.ig.com.br/destinos-nacionais/" target="_self" class="subHome-nav__link  destinos-nacionais">    <span class="subMenu-button"></span>

	<div class="module span4 no-margin">		
						
			<a href="/mais-noticias-3/422-noticias-2017/1032-ibama-confirma-multa-de-r-50-milhoes-por-fraude-em-testes-de-emissao-e-exige-recall-da-volkswagen" class="img-rounded">

			<h3 >
				<a href="/mais-noticias-3/422-noticias-2017/1032-ibama-confirma-multa-de-r-50-milhoes-por-fraude-em-testes-de-emissao-e-exige-recall-da-volkswagen" >
					Ibama confirma multa de R$ 50 milhões por fraude em testes de emissão e exige recall da Volkswagen				</a>
			</h3>
	
			<p class="description">Brasília (24/03/2017)  O Ibama confirmou em decisão de recurso apresentado à 1ª instância administrativa a aplicação da multa de...</p>		</div>	<div class="module span4">		
						
			<a href="/mais-noticias-3/422-noticias-2017/1030-ibama-combate-comercio-de-madeira-extraida-ilegalmente-de-terras-indigenas-no-maranhao" class="img-rounded">
				<img src="/images/noticias/2017/03-Marco/operacao_maravalha.jpg" width="230" height="136" alt="" />
			</a>
						
		
	
				
			<h3 >

					Operação Maravalha combate extração ilegal de madeira em terras indígenas no MA				</a>
			</h3>
	
			<p class="description">Brasília (23/03/2017)  O Ibama, a Polícia Federal (PF) e a Polícia Rodoviária Federal (PRF) iniciaram nesta quinta-feira (23/03), no...</p>		</div>	<div class="module span4">

			</h3>

<script src="http://www.fapesp.br/media/functions.js"></script>
<script>
(function($) {
	$.fn.extend({
		tabs: function(autotab) {
			return this.each(function() {
				var elem = $(this), tab = $(document.createElement('ul')).prependTo(elem), divs = elem.children('div'), i = 0, timer = null;
				// show first
				$(divs.get(0)).show();
				
				divs.find('img').each(function() {
					$(this).click(function () {
						window.location.href = $(this).parents('div').find('a').attr('href');
					});
				});
				
				// create tabs
				for (i=0; i < divs.length; i++) {
					tab.append('<li'+(!i ? ' class="in"' : '')+'><b class="tl"></b><b class="tr"></b><span>'+ $(divs.get(i)).attr('rule') +'</span></li>');
				}
				
				// get tabs
				tabs = tab.children();
				
				// actions
				tabs.click(function() {
					tabs.removeClass('in');
					$(this).addClass('in');
					divs.hide();
					i = tabs.index(this);
					$(divs[i]).fadeIn('slow');
					
					if (autotab) {
						resetTimer();
					}
				});
				
				if (autotab) {
					addTimer();
				}
				
				function addTimer() {
					timer = window.setInterval(showNext, 10500);
				}
				
				function resetTimer() {
					window.clearTimeout(timer);
					addTimer();
				}
				
				function showNext() {
					if (tabs.length > i + 1)
						i++;
					else
						i = 0;
					
					tabs.removeClass('in');
					$(tabs[i]).addClass('in');
					divs.hide();
					$(divs[i]).fadeIn('slow');
				}
			});
		},
		placeholder: function() {
			return this.each(function() {
				$('[placeholder]', this)
					.focus(function() {
						if ($(this).val() == $(this).attr('placeholder'))
							$(this).val('').css('color', '#000');
					})
					.blur(function() {
						if (!$(this).val() || $(this).val() == $(this).attr('placeholder'))
							$(this).val(function() { return $(this).attr('placeholder') }).css('color', '#ccc');
					})
					.filter(':not([value])').val(function() { return $(this).attr('placeholder') }).css('color', '#ccc')
					.parents('form').
						bind('submit', function() {
							$('[placeholder]', this).val(function() { return $(this).val() != $(this).attr('placeholder') ? $(this).val() : '' });
						});
			});
		},
		
		// Text tools are functions to make simple and quick add tools to the text
		// use the name pattern "tt" when create another function
		tt1: function() {
			return this.each(function() {
				$(this).children('div').each(function() {
					// use attr on the main element to set values in this code
					var tt = $(
						'<div class="media">'+
							'<b>Instruções para apresentação de propostas</b>'+
							'<p>'+
								//'<small>Formatos:</small><br/>'+
								'<a style="margin:8px 0 0 17px;" target="_blank" class="icon-html28" href="'+ $(this).attr('html') +'">HTML</a>'+
								//'<a class="icon-pdf28">PDF</a>'+
							'</p>'+
						'</div>'
					).fadeTo('fast', .5);
					
					$(this).prepend(tt);
					
					$(this).hover(
						function() {
							tt.fadeTo('normal', 1)
						},
						function() {
							tt.fadeTo('normal', .5);
						}
					);
				})
			});
		}
	});
})(jQuery);

var ui = {
	page: {
		col: function() {
			var u = /\/(\d+)/.exec(window.location.href)[1];
		
			$('#menu li a').each(function() {
				if (/\/(\d+)/.exec($(this).attr('href'))[1] == u)
					$(this).addClass('in');
			});
		}
	}
};

// fapesp tracker
var _gaq = _gaq || [];
_gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-159627-1']);
_gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);
</script>

<div id="page" class="page pg2col">
		<div id="menu">
	<h4>Histórico</h4><ul><li><a href="/2">A FAPESP</a></li></ul><script>ui.page.col()</script>	</div>
		<script>$.trim(document.getElementById('menu').innerHTML) == '' ? $('#page').addClass('noBg') : '';</script>
	<div id="content">
		<h5 class="lang"><a href="/en/304" hreflang="en">English version</a></h5>		
		<h4 class="breadcrumb"><a href="/">Página inicial</a> &raquo <a href="http://www.fapesp.br/2">A Instituição</a> &raquo <a href="http://www.fapesp.br/materia/28/historico/criacao-e-estruturacao-da-fapesp.htm">Histórico</a></h4>
		<h1 class="title">Criação e Estruturação da FAPESP </h1>

		<div class="text">
						<div class="img">
				<img alt="Criação e Estruturação da FAPESP" src="http://www.fapesp.br/fotos/2009/28/foto_dentro28_20.jpg"/>
								<p style="font-size: 100%; line-height: 17px;">O começo em duas salas da Faculdade de Medicina</p>
				<script>
				$('.img img').load(function() {
					var i = $(this);
					i.next().css({width: i.width()});
				});
				</script>
							</div>
						
						
			<p>A Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de São Paulo (FAPESP) foi formalmente criada em 1960 (Lei Orgânica 5.918, de 18 de outubro de 1960) e começou a funcionar efetivamente em 1962 (Decreto 40.132, de 23 de maio de 1962). Entretanto, ela já fora prevista na Constituição Estadual de 1947, graças a um esforço de um grupo de homens de laboratório e de cátedra liderado por Adriano Marchini e Luiz Meiller. <br />
<br />
A Carta paulista estabeleceu em seu Artigo 123: "O amparo à pesquisa científica será propiciado pelo Estado, por intermédio de uma fundação organizada em moldes a serem estabelecidos por lei". <br />
<br />
Determinava ainda: "Anualmente, o Estado atribuirá a essa Fundação, como renda especial de sua privativa administração, a quantia não inferior a meio por cento de sua receita ordinária". <br />
<br />
A definição constitucional de um orçamento próprio para a Fundação, baseado na transferência de 0,5% do total da receita tributária do Estado - percentual posteriormente elevado para 1%, pela Constituição de 1989 -, foi o grande instrumento que viabilizou a FAPESP nos moldes antevistos por seus idealizadores: um organismo autônomo de apoio a pesquisa, eficiente em sua administração, ágil nas decisões, gerido por especialistas altamente qualificados e diretamente comprometido com as finalidades do desenvolvimento científico e tecnológico. <br />
<br />
Some-se a isso a decisão do Governo Estadual de destinar à nova Fundação, no momento em que ela começou a funcionar, uma dotação inicial de US$ 2,7 milhões para a formação de um patrimônio rentável, e se terá os fundamentos originais do bem-sucedido modelo da FAPESP. <br />
<br />
Os recursos do Tesouro são repassados à Fundação mensalmente desde a Constituição de 1989 e com rigorosa regularidade. As receitas originárias do patrimônio da FAPESP, criteriosamente administradas, garantem a estabilidade das linhas regulares de fomento a pesquisa e têm permitido a criação de programas especiais, destinados a induzir novas áreas de investigação e a assegurar a superação de dificuldades específicas do sistema de pesquisa do Estado. <br />
<br />
<br />
<b>Conheça os instrumentos legais relativos à criação e estruturação da FAPESP:</b></p>
<ul>
    <li>
    <p><a href="http://www.fapesp.br/materia/232/historico/constituicao-do-estado-de-sao-paulo-de-1947.htm">Constituição do Estado de São Paulo de 1947</a></p>
    </li>
    <li>
    <p><a href=http://www.fapesp.br/6279>Lei Orgânica da Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de São Paulo</a> (Lei 5.918, de 18 de outubro de 1960)</p>
    </li>
    <li>
    <p><a href="http://www.fapesp.br/materia/92/historico/estatutos-da-fundacao-de-amparo-a-pesquisa-do-estado-de-sao-paulo-e-decreto-n-40.132-de-23-de-maio-de-1962.htm">Estatutos da Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de São Paulo e Decreto Nº 40.132, de 23 de maio de 1962</a></p>
    </li>
    <li>
    <p><a href="http://www.fapesp.br/materia/5252">Constituição Estadual de 1989</a></p>
    </li>
    <li>
    <p><a href="http://www.fapesp.br/materia/1512/historico/regimento-interno.htm">Regimento Interno</a></p>
    </li>
    <li>
    <p><a href="http://www.fapesp.br/materia/1513/historico/portaria-cs-n-41-2003.htm">Portaria CS Nº 41/2003</a></p>
    </li>
</ul>
<p><b><a href="http://www.bv.fapesp.br/linha-do-tempo/">Linha do tempo da FAPESP</a></b></p>		</div>

<script>
$('#index > a').click(function() {
	var self = this, $e = $(this);
	
	function show() {
		$e.addClass('in').next().find('ul').slideDown();
		$(document).bind('click.clickHandler', clickHandler);
	}
	
	function hide() {
		$e.removeClass('in').next().find('ul').slideUp();
		$(document).unbind('click.clickHandler');
	}
	
	function clickHandler(event) {
		if (event.target != self)
			hide();
	}
	
	if ($e.hasClass('in')) hide(); else show();
	//$(this).toggleClass('in').next().find('ul').slideToggle();
});


// IE fix
$('#ie .sitename').append('<b class="l"></b><b class="r"></b>');
$('#ie .box').append('<b class="tl"></b><b class="tr"></b><b class="bl"></b><b class="br"></b>');
</script>

})();

     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
         var $ = jQuery;

         $(".tab-menus li").hover(function(){
             $(this).find(".title").addClass('active');
             $(this).find(".tab-title-shadow").css('display', "block");
             $(this).find(".columns").css('display', "block");
           }, function(){
             $(this).find(".title").removeClass('active');
             $(this).find(".tab-title-shadow").css('display', "none");
             $(this).find(".columns").css('display', "none");
           });
         
         $("#mapa-site-toggle").click(function(e) {
             e.preventDefault();
             $("#mapa-site").toggle({
               complete: function () {
                   $('html, body').animate({
                     scrollTop: $("#mapa-site").offset().top
                   }, 2000);
               }
             });
         });
     });
  </script>

			<h2 style="display:none" class="title"><span id="visitação" class="sptab-title sptab_sfxmanchete-lateral-tit-menor">Visitação</span></h2>
			<div class="manchete-texto-lateral">
		<div class="row-fluid">
			
		<div class="span4 no-margin">
				
		
					
				<h1 >
					<a href="/portal/visitacao1/visite-os-parques" >
						Visite os Parques					</a>
				</h1>
		
					<span style="font-size: small;" size="2">Preparar as Unidades de Conservação para receber visitantes, com qualidade e segurança, é uma das prioridades do Ministério do Meio Ambiente (MMA) e do Instituto Chico Mendes de Conservação da Biodiversidade (ICMBio). Os esforços do ICMBio para a consolidação da visitação têm resultado em crescimento do número de visitantes.</span>				</div>
				<div class="span8 img-manchete-lateral">				
											
					<a href="/portal/visitacao1/visite-os-parques">

			<h2 style="display:none" class="title"><span id="uso_sustentável" class="sptab-title sptab_sfxmanchete-lateral-tit-menor">Uso Sustentável</span></h2>
			<div class="manchete-texto-lateral">
		<div class="row-fluid">
			
		<div class="span4 no-margin">
				
		
					
				<h1 >
					<a href="/portal/populacoestradicionais/producao-e-uso-sustentavel" >
						Produção e Uso Sustentável					</a>
				</h1>
		
					<p class="description">O Instituto busca, a partir desta área, atuar no desenvolvimento de estratégias promissoras de produção e uso sustentável dos recursos naturais que resultem na disseminação de experiências exitosas, na promoção do modo de vida dos povos e populações tradicionais, na valorização de seus conhecimentos e saberes, no manejo adequado dos...</p>				</div>
				<div class="span8 img-manchete-lateral">

				<h1 >
					<a href="/portal/pesquisa/projetos-apoiados" >
						Projetos Apoiados					</a>
				</h1>
		
					<p class="description">O Instituto executa diversos programas de pesquisa aplicada à conservação da biodiversidade e ao uso sustentável dos recursos, bem como fomenta projetos de seu interesse.
Os projetos de pesquisa, tanto internos quanto externos, resultam na geração de conhecimento efetivo para a conservação e uso sustentável da biodiversidade.
Eles são...</p>				</div>

					<div class="galleria-info-text">
					    <div class="galleria-info-title">
					    	<h3><a href="/portal/component/phocagallery/4/detail/22-sapinho-narigudo-de-barriga-vermelha">Sapinho Narigudo de Barriga Vermelha - elanophryniscus dorsalis</a></h3>
					    </div>
					    <div class="galleria-info-description"><p class="description">A espécie se alimenta, principalmente, de formigas ou cupins; apresenta reprodução explosiva, que ocorre em períodos de chuva intensa, entre os meses de setembro e...</p></div>
					    <div data-index="9" class="rights">Foto: Patrick Colombo</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
									<div class="item">
				<img alt="Foto da galeria de imagens: sem descrição informada." src="http://www.icmbio.gov.br/portal/images/phocagallery/faunaameacada/thumbs/phoca_thumb_l_faunahome_saum.jpg">
				<div class="galleria-info">
					<div class="galleria-info-text">
					    <div class="galleria-info-title">
					    	<h3><a href="/portal/component/phocagallery/4/detail/23-sauim-de-coleira">Sauim-de-coleira - Saguinus bicolor</a></h3>
					    </div>
					    <div class="galleria-info-description"><p class="description">A dieta principal é composta de frutos e invertebrados, mas também pequenos vertebrados, néctar e goma. A área de vida é variável, sendo estimado entre 12 e 35 ha em áreas...</p></div>
					    <div data-index="10" class="rights">Foto: Rosana Subirá</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
									<div class="item">
				<img alt="Foto da galeria de imagens: sem descrição informada." src="http://www.icmbio.gov.br/portal/images/phocagallery/faunaameacada/thumbs/phoca_thumb_l_faunahome_surubim.jpg">
				<div class="galleria-info">
					<div class="galleria-info-text">
					    <div class="galleria-info-title">
					    	<h3><a href="/portal/component/phocagallery/4/detail/24-surubim-do-paraiba">Surubim-do-Paraíba - Steindachneridion parahybae</a></h3>
					    </div>
					    <div class="galleria-info-description"><p class="description">É um bagre de grande porte, atingindo pelo menos 60 cm de comprimento padrão. Sua ocorrência está associada a poções não muito profundos localizados nas regiões centrais dos rios e...</p></div>
					    <div data-index="11" class="rights">Foto: CEPTA</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
									<div class="item">
				<img alt="Foto da galeria de imagens: sem descrição informada." src="http://www.icmbio.gov.br/portal/images/phocagallery/faunaameacada/thumbs/phoca_thumb_l_faunahome_tartarugacabecuda.jpg">
				<div class="galleria-info">
					<div class="galleria-info-text">
					    <div class="galleria-info-title">
					    	<h3><a href="/portal/component/phocagallery/4/detail/25-tartaruga-cabecuda">Tartaruga Cabeçuda - Caretta caretta</a></h3>
					    </div>
					    <div class="galleria-info-description"><p class="description">Como indica seu nome vulgar, distingue-se morfologicamente dos demais Cheloniidae por sua cabeça proporcionalmente grande em relação a seu comprimento total.O sexo dos filhotes é...</p></div>
					    <div data-index="12" class="rights">Foto: TAMAR</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
									<div class="item">
				<img alt="Foto da galeria de imagens: sem descrição informada." src="http://www.icmbio.gov.br/portal/images/phocagallery/faunaameacada/thumbs/phoca_thumb_l_faunahome_tartarugaoliva.jpg">
				<div class="galleria-info">
					<div class="galleria-info-text">
					    <div class="galleria-info-title">
					    	<h3><a href="/portal/component/phocagallery/4/detail/26-tartaruga-oliva">Tartaruga Oliva - Lepidochelys olivacea</a></h3>
					    </div>
					    <div class="galleria-info-description"><p class="description">Tartaruga-oliva é uma das menores tartarugas marinhas do mundo, com peso entre 35 e 50 kg. O tempo necessário para atingir a maturidade sexual é estimado entre 7 a 30...</p></div>
					    <div data-index="13" class="rights">Foto: TAMAR</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
					</div>
		<a data-slide="prev" href="#gallery-carousel-7039" class="left carousel-control"><i class="icon-angle-left"></i><span class="hide">Mover foto esquerda</span></a>
		<!-- separador para fins de acessibilidade <--><span class="hide">&nbsp;</span></--><!-- fim separador para fins de acessibilidade -->
		<a data-slide="next" href="#gallery-carousel-7039" class="right carousel-control"><i class="icon-angle-right"></i><span class="hide">Mover foto esquerda</span></a>
	</div>
</div>

	</div>

</article></div><div class='col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-4'><article class="course concurso corner-ribbon">
    <div class="ribbon">
        <span>TJSP1601</span>
    </div>
    <h1 class="course-title home">
        Concurso
    </h1>
    <div class="course-headline">
        <h2>Tribunal de Justi&#231;a/SP </h2>
        <p class="course-address">SP</p>
    </div>
    <div class="course-informations">
        <p>
            Assistente Social e Psic&#243;logo
        </p>
        <p class="escolaridade">
            ENSINO SUPERIOR
        </p>
        <p>
                <strong>Salário:</strong> R$

        function addMoreLinkBehaviour() {
            $('#maisProjetos').click(function () {
                //$('#maisProjetos').button('loading');
                $.get($(this).data("url"), function (response) {
                    $('#maisBlock').replaceWith(response);
                    addMoreLinkBehaviour();
                });

                return false;
            });
        }

        <script>

            function onRequestStart(sender, args) {
                if (args.get_eventTarget().indexOf("btnExcel") >= 0)
                    args.set_enableAjax(false);

                if (ga !== null) {
                    ga('send', 'pageview');
                }
            }
            
            function onClientShowing(sender, args) {
                var filho = $('.aguarde');
                var avo = filho.parent().parent();
            
                var top = (avo.height() - 20) / 2;
                var left = (avo.width() - 86) / 2;
            
                if (top < 0)
                    top = 0;
                if (left < 0)
                    left = 0;
            
                filho.css('top', top + 'px');
                filho.css('left', left + 'px');
            }
            
            (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
                i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r;
                i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                    (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
                }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();
                a = s.createElement(o),
                m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];
                a.async = 1;
                a.src = g;
                m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
            })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

            ga('create', 'UA-23555956-12', 'auto');
            ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
            ga('send', 'pageview');
        </script>

		jQuery(document).ready(function (){
			jQuery('.advancedSelect').chosen({"disable_search_threshold":10,"search_contains":true,"allow_single_deselect":true,"placeholder_text_multiple":"Type or select some options","placeholder_text_single":"Select an option","no_results_text":"No results match"});

jQuery(document).ready(function() {
	var value, searchword = jQuery('#mod-finder-searchword315');

		// Get the current value.
		value = searchword.val();

		// If the current value equals the default value, clear it.
		searchword.on('focus', function ()
		{
			var el = jQuery(this);

			if (el.val() === 'Search ...')
			{
				el.val('');
			}
		});

		// If the current value is empty, set the previous value.
		searchword.on('blur', function ()
		{
			var el = jQuery(this);

			if (!el.val())
			{
				el.val(value);
			}
		});

		jQuery('#mod-finder-searchform315').on('submit', function (e)
		{
			e.stopPropagation();
			var advanced = jQuery('#mod-finder-advanced315');

			// Disable select boxes with no value selected.
			if (advanced.length)
			{
				advanced.find('select').each(function (index, el)
				{
					var el = jQuery(el);

					if (!el.val())
					{
						el.attr('disabled', 'disabled');
					}
				});
			}
		});
	var suggest = jQuery('#mod-finder-searchword315').autocomplete({
		serviceUrl: '/component/finder/?task=suggestions.suggest&amp;format=json&amp;tmpl=component',
		paramName: 'q',
		minChars: 1,
		maxHeight: 400,
		width: 300,
		zIndex: 9999,
		deferRequestBy: 500
	});});

				<li><a href="https://community.joomla.org">Community Portal</a></li>

<div class="custom topbanner"  >
	<div class="hero-overlay">
<div class="container">
<div class="custom hero-heading center">
<h2>The Free Software Powering Millions of Websites</h2>
<p>Joomla! is an award-winning content management system (CMS), which enables you to build web sites and powerful online applications.</p>
</div>
<div class="hero-teaser row-fluid center">
<div class="span4">
<article><header class="hidden-phone"><a href="https://downloads.joomla.org" title="Download Joomla!"><span class="icon-circled icon-circled-sm icon-shadowed"> <span class="icon-download svg-icon"></span></span></a>
<h3 class="hero-teaser-title">Download Joomla!</h3>
</header>
<div class="hero-teaser-body hidden-phone">
<p>Download and Install Joomla! in your own server or development environment.</p>
</div>
<footer><a href="https://downloads.joomla.org" title="Download Joomla!">Download Joomla! &rarr;</a></footer></article>
</div>
<div class="span4">
<article><header class="hidden-phone"><a href="https://www.joomla.com" title="Free hosted Joomla! website"><span class="icon-circled icon-circled-sm icon-shadowed"><span class="icon-rocket svg-icon"></span> </span></a>
<h3 class="hero-teaser-title">Use Joomla!</h3>
</header>
<div class="hero-teaser-body hidden-phone">
<p>Quickly launch a basic version of Joomla! on joomla.com. Easily upgrade for additional features.</p>
</div>
<footer><a href="https://www.joomla.com" title="Free hosted Joomla! website">Launch Joomla! &rarr;</a></footer></article>
</div>
<div class="span4">
<article><header class="hidden-phone"><a href="https://demo.joomla.org/" title="Joomla! Demo"><span class="icon-circled icon-circled-sm icon-shadowed"> <span class="icon-screen svg-icon"></span> </span></a>
<h3 class="hero-teaser-title">Try Joomla!</h3>
</header>
<div class="hero-teaser-body hidden-phone">
<p>Experiment with a full 90 day demo version of Joomla. Great for testing an extension or template.</p>
</div>
<footer><a href="https://demo.joomla.org/" title="Joomla! Demo">Start Joomla! Demo &rarr;</a></footer></article>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="clear">&nbsp;</div></div>

			<div class="moduletable whyjoomla">
						

<div class="custom whyjoomla"  >
	<div class="row-fluid customcontainer">
<div class="span6">
<h2>Why Joomla?</h2>
<p>Hundreds of developers have been improving Joomla! since the first version was released in 2005. This immense effort has made Joomla! very popular, easy to use, stable and secure.</p>
<p>Joomla! has thousands of free extensions and templates allowing you to customize your site to fit your specific needs.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a class="btn btn-danger btn-large" href="/3" title="Discover Joomla! 3.x">Learn more about Joomla! 3</a></p>
</div>
<div class="span6 video-container"><iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/j006Q7mDYIU?rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe></div>
</div></div>
		</div>
			<div class="moduletable features">

<div class="span7 events">
<div class="event">
<h2>Upcoming Events</h2>
<figure><img src="/images/homepage/joomla-events.jpg" alt="joomla events" /></figure>
<h3>JoomlaDay Netherlands 2017</h3>
<p>JoomlaDay Netherlands will take place from Friday, March 31st until Sunday, April 2nd in Zeist! It's the 12th edition of the Dutch JoomlaDay and we are working on an interesting program for Joomla! beginners and advanced users.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a class="btn btn-primary btn-large" title="Joomla! Events" href="https://community.joomla.org/events.html">More events</a></p>
</div>
<div class="contribute">
<div>
<h2>Joomla! Means Community</h2>
<p>Joomla! is the only major CMS that is built entirely by volunteers from all over the world. We have a strong community bond and all take pleasure in building something that has a large global impact. If you are interested in volunteering please head over to the volunteer portal.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a class="btn btn-danger btn-large" title="Contribute to Joomla!" href="https://volunteers.joomla.org">Get involved</a></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div></div>

<div class="custom who center"  >
	<h2>Who is using Joomla?</h2>
<p class="lead">Joomla! is trusted by some of the world&rsquo;s most well-known companies and much-loved brands as well as millions of websites throughout the world!</p>
<div class="row-fluid effects">

<h3>Lipton <span>Ice Tea</span></h3>

<a href="https://showcase.joomla.org" title="Joomla! showcase directory">View more</a> </figcaption></figure>

		<li><a href="https://www.joomla.org/privacy-policy.html">Privacy Policy</a></li>
		<li><a href="https://crowdin.com/projects/Joomla">Help Translate</a></li>
		<li><a href="https://github.com/joomla/joomla-websites/issues/new?title=[joomla.org]%20&body=Please%20describe%20the%20problem%20or%20your%20issue">Report an Issue</a></li>
		<li><a href="/login.html">Log in</a></li>
	</ul>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var myArray = ['server a', 'server b', 'server c', 'server d'];
    var SrvNm = myArray[Math.floor(Math.random() * myArray.length)];
    var SrvMin = -20;
    var SrvMax = 1000;
    var SrvTm = Math.floor(Math.random() * (SrvMax - SrvMin + 1)) + SrvMin;
    var min = 0;
    var max = 90;
    var sales = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;
    var items=Math.floor(Math.random()*10)
    var myVar = ['varA', 'varB'];
    var glimpseVar = myVar[Math.floor(Math.random() * myArray.length)];
    RProfiler.addInfo('variation', glimpseVar);
    RProfiler.addInfo('conversion', sales, items);
    RProfiler.addInfo('indicator', 'srvrtime', SrvTm);
    RProfiler.addInfo('tracepoint', 'srvrname', SrvNm);
    RProfiler.addInfo('indicator', 'size', 2722);
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	function ab_search(ab_callback, args){
		var valid_tags = new Array()

		args.forEach(function(c, i, a) {
			if (c) {
				if (typeof(a[i]) ===  'string') valid_tags.push(c)
				else if (Object.prototype.toString.call(a[i]) === '[object Array]') {
					c.forEach(
						function(c, i, a){ if(typeof(c) === 'string') valid_tags.push(c)}
					);
				}
			}
		})

		if (valid_tags.length > 0) {
			return ab_callback(valid_tags)
		}
	}

	function ab_begin() {
		var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments)

		document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function(event) {
			var val = ab_search(function (valid_tags) {
				var ab_found = 'disabled',
				is_valid_el = function(tag) {
					if (tag !== null && tag !== undefined) ab_found = is_ab_found(tag)
				},
				is_ab_found = function(tag) {
					return (tag.clientHeight=== 0 || tag.clientHeight=== undefined || tag.clientWidth === 0 || tag.clientWidth === undefined)? 'enabled': ab_found;
				}

				valid_tags.forEach(function(c, i, a) {
					var tag = document.getElementsByClassName(c)
					is_valid_el(tag[0])
					tag = window.document.getElementById(c)
					is_valid_el(tag)
				});

				return ab_found;
			}, args)

			val = (val) ? val : 'undefined';
			RProfiler.addInfo('tracepoint', 'ab', val);
		});
	}

	//put IDs and/or classnames here
	ab_begin(['banner', 'custom'])
</script>
</body>

																<article id="content">
					<h1 class="title">Main Page</h1>
					<h3 id="tagline"></h3>
					
					<div id="social">
						<!-- AddThis Button BEGIN -->
						<div class="addthis_toolbox addthis_default_style addthis_16x16_style">

					</div>
										
					<h5 class="subtitle"></h5>
					<div class="clear_both"></div>
					<div class="mw-bodytext">
						<div id="mw-content-text" lang="en" dir="ltr" class="mw-content-ltr"><div class="hf-nsheader"></div><div class="hf-header"></div><div class="row">
<div class="large-12 small-12 columns text-center hide-for-small"><span style="font-size:2.5em;"><b>Joomla!</b><span style="font-size:.4em; vertical-align:super;"><sup>®</sup></span></span>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
<div class="center">
<div class="floatnone"><a href="/File:Joomla_logo.png" class="image"><img alt="Joomla logo.png" src="/images/thumb/a/ab/Joomla_logo.png/80px-Joomla_logo.png" width="80" height="80" srcset="/images/thumb/a/ab/Joomla_logo.png/120px-Joomla_logo.png 1.5x, /images/thumb/a/ab/Joomla_logo.png/160px-Joomla_logo.png 2x" data-file-width="625" data-file-height="625" /></a></div>
</div>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
</div>
<div class="large-12 small-12 columns text-center hide-for-small"><span style="font-size:2.5em;font-weight:bold;">Documentation</span>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
<div class="large-11 large-centered column small-12">
<p>An online <a href="/Special:MyLanguage/JDOC:About" title="Special:MyLanguage/JDOC:About">collaborative community manual</a> for Joomla! users, developers or anyone interested in learning more about Joomla! Currently, we have <a href="/Special:Statistics" title="Special:Statistics">6,426</a> articles written, maintained, and translated by our Joomla! community members.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
<div class="large-12 small-12 column text-center" style="margin:0;">
<div style="min-width:60px; display:inline-block; margin:0 auto;">
<div class="fa fa-language fa-3x"></div>
</div>
<div id="lang-control" style="max-width:80%; margin:0 auto;">

<div style="clear:both;"></div>

<div style="clear:both;"></div>

<div class="row-fluid banner-position ">
	<div class="span9">
<div id="jFeatures" class="carousel slide">
<ol class="nav nav-tabs nav-stacked ">
	
		
		<ol class="carousel-indicators">
       
							
				<li data-slide-to="0" data-target="#jFeatures"  class="active"></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="1" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="2" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="3" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="4" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
							
				<li data-slide-to="5" data-target="#jFeatures" ></li>
				
						
		</ol>
		
		<div class="carousel-inner">
							<div class="item active clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/159-create-categories-on-the-fly">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_create-categories-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">Create categories on the fly </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>It can get frustrating when you create a new item, and you realise that you havent created a category yet. Joomla! 3.6 now lets you create a category on the fly for articles, contacts, newsfeeds and banners.</p>                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/180-improved-joomla-updates">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 Feature" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_joomla-updates-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">Improved Joomla! Updates </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>This update adds an option for reinstalling Joomla&rsquo;s core files at the click of a button, overwriting any modified file(s) and reverting them back to the default. The option to update Joomla! by uploading the update file has been restored, as it was requested by feedback that the Joomla! Production Leadership Team (PLT) received from the Joomla! community.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/158-menu-type-acl">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_menu-acl-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">Menu type ACL </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>ACL in the backend did not exist at the menu level, now we have improved that. Give or block certain user groups access to a specific menu, and therefore also all menu items of that menu.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/157-see-what-s-in-your-menus-with-all-menu-items">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_all-menu-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">See what's in your menus with All Menu Items </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>The new option to show all items from all menus gives you a quick overview of what is displayed where on your website. It has never been easier to spot duplicated links, missing menu items or just get an overview of every menu on your site.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/160-sub-form-field">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_subform-field-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">Sub Form Field </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>With the new Sub Form Field function in Joomla! 3.6 we added some extra additional functionality next to Repeatable fields. Now you can nest XML forms inside each other or reuse your existing forms inside your current form.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
							<div class="item clearfix">
					<div class="span6 center">
						<a href="/3/161-the-revolution-in-joomla-ux-improvements">
							<img class="img-responsive" title="" alt="TOP Joomla! 3.6 feature icon" src="/3/images/features/en/j_3_6_ux_improvements-435x360_intro.png" />						</a>
					</div>
					
					<div class="span6">
						
						<p class="title">The revolution in Joomla! UX Improvements </p>
						<div class="visible-desktop">
                          <p>Joomla! 3.6 contains a lot of UX improvements. Now you can find your modules faster, have tasks done by dropdown, improved user management and so much more. Check all of the UX improvements in the full article.</p>
                      </div>
					</div>
					
						<a class="carousel-control left" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="prev">&lsaquo;</a>
						<a class="carousel-control right" href="#jFeatures" data-slide="next">&rsaquo;</a>
				</div>
				
					</div>
	</ol>
  </div>
</div>
	<div class="span3 ">		<div class="moduletable center">

<p>This update adds an option for reinstalling Joomla&rsquo;s core files at the click of a button, overwriting any modified file(s) and reverting them back to the default. The option to update Joomla! by uploading the update file has been restored, as it was requested by feedback that the Joomla! Production Leadership Team (PLT) received from the Joomla! community.</p>



      </div>

<p>Joomla! 3.6 contains a lot of UX improvements. Now you can find your modules faster, have tasks done by dropdown, improved user management and so much more. Check all of the UX improvements in the full article.</p>

<p>With the new Sub Form Field function in Joomla! 3.6 we added some extra additional functionality next to Repeatable fields. Now you can nest XML forms inside each other or reuse your existing forms inside your current form.</p>

					<span class="rrssb-icon">

							<path d="M25.424 15.887v8.447h-4.896v-7.882c0-1.98-.71-3.33-2.48-3.33-1.354 0-2.158.91-2.514 1.802-.13.315-.162.753-.162 1.194v8.216h-4.9s.067-13.35 0-14.73h4.9v2.087c-.01.017-.023.033-.033.05h.032v-.05c.65-1.002 1.812-2.435 4.414-2.435 3.222 0 5.638 2.106 5.638 6.632zM5.348 2.5c-1.676 0-2.772 1.093-2.772 2.54 0 1.42 1.066 2.538 2.717 2.546h.032c1.71 0 2.77-1.132 2.77-2.546C8.056 3.593 7.02 2.5 5.344 2.5h.005zm-2.48 21.834h4.896V9.604H2.867v14.73z" />

					<span class="rrssb-icon">
						<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="28" height="28" viewBox="0 0 28 28">

</div>
<p>It can get frustrating when you create a new item, and you realise that you havent created a category yet. Joomla! 3.6 now lets you create a category on the fly for articles, contacts, newsfeeds and banners.</p>

<p>ACL in the backend did not exist at the menu level, now we have improved that. Give or block certain user groups access to a specific menu, and therefore also all menu items of that menu.</p>

				<a href="http://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.joomla.org%2F3%2F157-see-what-s-in-your-menus-with-all-menu-items&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.joomla.org%2F3%2Fimages%2Ffeatures%2Fen%2Fj_3_6_all-menu-869x360.png&amp;description=See+what%27s+in+your+menus+with+All+Menu+Items">
					<span class="rrssb-icon">
						<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="28" height="28" viewBox="0 0 28 28">
							<path d="M14.02 1.57c-7.06 0-12.784 5.723-12.784 12.785S6.96 27.14 14.02 27.14c7.062 0 12.786-5.725 12.786-12.785 0-7.06-5.724-12.785-12.785-12.785zm1.24 17.085c-1.16-.09-1.648-.666-2.558-1.22-.5 2.627-1.113 5.146-2.925 6.46-.56-3.972.822-6.952 1.462-10.117-1.094-1.84.13-5.545 2.437-4.632 2.837 1.123-2.458 6.842 1.1 7.557 3.71.744 5.226-6.44 2.924-8.775-3.324-3.374-9.677-.077-8.896 4.754.19 1.178 1.408 1.538.49 3.168-2.13-.472-2.764-2.15-2.683-4.388.132-3.662 3.292-6.227 6.46-6.582 4.008-.448 7.772 1.474 8.29 5.24.58 4.254-1.815 8.864-6.1 8.532v.003z" />
						</svg>
					</span>
					<span class="rrssb-text">pinterest</span>
				</a>
			</li>
			</ul>
</div>
<p>The new option to show all items from all menus gives you a quick overview of what is displayed where on your website. It has never been easier to spot duplicated links, missing menu items or just get an overview of every menu on your site.</p>



      </div>
      <div class="clr">      </div>
      	<div class="center">

						Integrator					</a>
				</li>
						</ul>
      </div>
      
      

				</div>
				<!-- end item -->
							</div><!-- end span -->

	<script>
JCck.Core.baseURI = "";jQuery(window).on('load',  function() {
				new JCaption('img.caption');
			});jQuery(document).ready(function($){var hash = window.location.hash;
hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

$("form#seblod_form_f5118").on("change", "#com_language", function() {
	var loc = String(window.location.href);
	document.location.href = urlQueryParameter(loc,'comment_language', $(this).val()) +'#item_tab_comments';
});

function urlQueryParameter (uri,key, value) {
	var regEx = new RegExp("([?|&])" + key + "=.*?(&|$)", "i");
	var separator = uri.indexOf('?') !== -1 ? "&" : "?";
	if (uri.match(regEx))
		uri = uri.replace(regEx, '$1' + key + "=" + value + '$2');
	else
		uri = uri + separator + key + "=" + value;
	return uri;
};

$('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	$(this).tab('show');
	var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	window.location.hash = this.hash;
	$('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
});

var artid = jQuery("[id$='_value_art_id']").first().text();
ajaxFavorite(artid, "read");

$(".cck_button_favorite a").on("click", function() {
	ajaxFavorite(artid, "toggle");
});

function ajaxFavorite(artid, act){
	var url = "index.php?option=com_cck&format=raw&task=ajax&file=media/cck_dev/favorite.php";
	var request = jQuery.ajax({
		url: url,
		data: { art_id: artid, action: act },
		type: "GET",
		dataType: "json",
		success: changeFavoriteClass
	});
}

function changeFavoriteClass(data)
{
	if (data.status == "is_favorite")
	{
		jQuery(".cck_button_favorite a").removeClass("not_favorite").addClass("is_favorite");
	}
	else
	{
		jQuery(".cck_button_favorite a").removeClass("is_favorite").addClass("not_favorite");
	}
	return;
}});jQuery(document).ready(function($){ $("select:not(.select2-no-auto)").select2();$.each($(".select2-container"), function (i, n) {$(n).next().show().fadeTo(0, 0).height("0px").css({"left":0,"position":"absolute","top":0});$(n).prepend($(n).next());$(n).delay(500).queue(function () {$(this).removeClass("validate[required]");$(this).dequeue();});});});jQuery(document).ready(function (){

			});(function ($){
$(document).ready(function(){
  	var	sync1 			= $('#cck2r_a'),
		sync2 			= $('#cck2r_b'),
  		slidesPerPage 	= 0,
		syncedSecondary = false,
		tClassSecondary = 'owl-item',
		clickSecondary 	= true,
		firstLoop		= true,
		sync1Match	 	= true,
		sync2Match	 	= false;

	sync1.owlCarousel({
		items : 3,
		nav: true,
		dots: false,
		navContainer: false,
    	dotsContainer: false,
		margin: 25,
		loop: firstLoop,
		linked: '#cck2r_a,#cck2r_b',
		autoplay: true,
		autoplayTimeout: 5000,
		autoplayHoverPause: true,
		slideSpeed : 2000,
		responsiveRefreshRate : 200,
		navText: ['&lsaquo;','&rsaquo;'],
		lazyLoad:true,
		responsiveClass:true,
		responsive:{
			0:{
				items:1,
				margin: 0				
			},
			489:{
				items:2,
				margin: 25		
			},
			767:{
				items:2,
				margin: 25		
			},
			959:{
				items:3,
				margin: 25		
			}
		}
	});
		
	if(syncedSecondary) {	
		sync2.owlCarousel({
			onInitialized : callback,
			loop: $('.item', sync2 ).size() > slidesPerPage ? true:false,
			items : slidesPerPage,
			nav: true,
			dots: true,
			margin: 16,
			linked: '#cck2r_a,#cck2r_b',
			autoplay: true,
			autoplayTimeout: 5000,
			autoplayHoverPause: true,
			lazyLoad:true,
			smartSpeed: 200,
			slideSpeed : 500,    
			responsiveRefreshRate : 100			
		});
	}
	
	function callback(event) {
    	var items = event.item.count;
		var secondLoop = firstLoop;
		if ( items <= slidesPerPage ) {
			secondLoop = false;	
		}		
		if( clickSecondary ) {
			sync2.on('click', '.' + tClassSecondary, function(e){
				e.preventDefault();
				var number = 0 ;		
				if ( firstLoop && secondLoop ) {
					if ( items > slidesPerPage ) {
						number = $(this).index() - slidesPerPage -1 ;
					} else {
						number = $(this).index() - slidesPerPage ;
					}
				} else {
					number = $(this).index();
				}
				sync1.data('owl.carousel').to(number, 300, true);
			});
		}
	}
	
	if ( sync1Match	) {
		sync1.find('.item-match').matchHeight({
			byRow: true,
			property: 'height',
			target: null,
			remove: false
		});
	}
	if ( sync2Match	) {
		sync2.find('.item-match').matchHeight({
			byRow: true,
			property: 'height',
			target: null,
			remove: false
		});
	}
		
});})(jQuery);
		jQuery(document).ready(function (){
			jQuery('select.tag').chosen({"disable_search_threshold":10,"search_contains":true,"allow_single_deselect":true,"placeholder_text_multiple":"Type or select some options","placeholder_text_single":"Select an option","no_results_text":"No results match"});
		});
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){$('#item_tags_search').attr('style','');
$('#item_tags_search').select2({
placeholder: "- Tags -"
});});jQuery(document).ready(function($){$('#item_category_search').attr('style','');

placeholder: "- Category -"
});});(function ($){

$(document).ready(function(){
  	var	sync1 			= $('#cck26r_a'),
		sync2 			= $('#cck26r_b'),
  		slidesPerPage 	= 1,
		syncedSecondary = true,
		tClassSecondary = 'owl-item',
		clickSecondary 	= false,
		firstLoop		= true,
		sync1Match	 	= false,
		sync2Match	 	= false;

	sync1.owlCarousel({
		items : 1,
		nav: true,
		dots: true,
		navContainer: "#cck26r #customNav",
    	dotsContainer: false,
		margin: 0,
		loop: firstLoop,
		linked: '#cck26r_a,#cck26r_b',
		autoplay: true,
		autoplayTimeout: 5000,
		autoplayHoverPause: true,
		slideSpeed : 2000,
		responsiveRefreshRate : 200,
		navText: ['&lsaquo;','&rsaquo;'],
		lazyLoad:true,
		responsiveClass:false,
		responsive:{
			0:{
				items:1,
				margin: 16				
			},
			489:{
				items:1,
				margin: 16		
			},
			767:{
				items:1,
				margin: 16		
			},
			959:{
				items:1,
				margin: 0		
			}
		}
	});
		
	if(syncedSecondary) {	
		sync2.owlCarousel({
			onInitialized : callback,
			loop: $('.item', sync2 ).size() > slidesPerPage ? true:false,
			items : slidesPerPage,
			nav: false,
			dots: false,
			margin: 0,
			linked: '#cck26r_a,#cck26r_b',
			autoplay: true,
			autoplayTimeout: 5000,
			autoplayHoverPause: true,
			lazyLoad:true,
			smartSpeed: 200,
			slideSpeed : 500,    
			responsiveRefreshRate : 100			
		});
	}
	
	function callback(event) {
    	var items = event.item.count;
		var secondLoop = firstLoop;
		if ( items <= slidesPerPage ) {
			secondLoop = false;	
		}		
		if( clickSecondary ) {
			sync2.on('click', '.' + tClassSecondary, function(e){
				e.preventDefault();
				var number = 0 ;		
				if ( firstLoop && secondLoop ) {
					if ( items > slidesPerPage ) {
						number = $(this).index() - slidesPerPage -1 ;
					} else {
						number = $(this).index() - slidesPerPage ;
					}
				} else {
					number = $(this).index();
				}
				sync1.data('owl.carousel').to(number, 300, true);
			});
		}
	}
	
	if ( sync1Match	) {
		sync1.find('.item-match').matchHeight({
			byRow: true,
			property: 'height',
			target: null,
			remove: false
		});
	}
	if ( sync2Match	) {
		sync2.find('.item-match').matchHeight({
			byRow: true,
			property: 'height',
			target: null,
			remove: false
		});
	}
		
});})(jQuery);
